programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: An exploration of the textile mills and factories that once thrived in Britain during the Industrial Revolution. From New Lanark in Scotland to the mill town of Burnley, Fred meets ex-workers to discover what life was really like, and chats to a group that has dedicated 30 years to restoring mill engines

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Liz McIvor examines how the railways stimulated great changes to the nations economy, and encouraged a new generation of mechanical engineers, skilled workers, managers and accountants. Originally, local entrepreneurs viewed trains as vehicles for shifting raw materials, stock and goods, however it soon became clear that there was money to be made in transporting people

programme.title: The Two Ronnies Sketchbook
programme.desc: Messrs Corbett and Barker reminisce about some of the best moments from their career, including the classic Fork Handles sketch, and theres a final chance to catch up with the work of the Phantom Raspberry Blower. Katie Melua provides an interlude to the comic mayhem with a performance of Crawling Up a Hill. From April 2005

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Harris accidentally drops stolen pills into Fletchers midday cuppa - much to the annoyance of prison racketeer Harry Grout, who resents a newcomer muscling in on his patch. Classic comedy, starring Ronnie Barker. First broadcast in 1977

programme.title: The Many Faces of
programme.sub-title: The Many Faces of Ronnie Barker
programme.desc: The story of a quiet, dedicated man who might have been a bank manager, but went on to become one of the nations most popular comedy stars. Ben Elton, Michael Grade, David Renwick and Josephine Tewson are among friends and colleagues who remember his partnership with Ronnie Corbett in sketch show The Two Ronnies, as skinflint grocer Arkwright in Open All Hours and crafty prisoner Fletch in Porridge. There is also a look at his prolific writing career and his work as an actor in serious roles

programme.title: Storyville
programme.desc: Documentary following the family of Liat Beinin Atzili as they try to secure her release after she was kidnapped by Hamas during the October 7 attack on Israel in 2023 and held hostage. Her father Yehuda initially travels to the US to take part in a campaign for the hostages release, as Liat is a dual American-Israeli citizen, but his desire to advocate for peace and reconciliation quickly puts himself at odds with political forces he encounters

programme.title: Success Story: Gore Vidal
programme.desc: Gore Vidal, the enfant terrible of American letters, then living in some splendour in Italy, talks about the ironies of succeeding in a world that he delights in attacking. First broadcast 6 August 1975

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: An exploration of the textile mills and factories that once thrived in Britain during the Industrial Revolution. From New Lanark in Scotland to the mill town of Burnley, Fred meets ex-workers to discover what life was really like, and chats to a group that has dedicated 30 years to restoring mill engines

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Liz McIvor examines how the railways stimulated great changes to the nations economy, and encouraged a new generation of mechanical engineers, skilled workers, managers and accountants. Originally, local entrepreneurs viewed trains as vehicles for shifting raw materials, stock and goods, however it soon became clear that there was money to be made in transporting people

programme.title: Britains Lost Masterpieces
programme.desc: British art detectives Bendor Grosvenor and Emma Dabiri hunt for of the nations great lost masterpieces. They uncover if a painting of a society woman is by artist Joshua Reynolds and discover which celebrity playwright will lead them from Rome to Bath to Londons Royal Academy

programme.title: Genius of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Bettany Hughes series exploring the lives and teachings of influential ancient philosophers draws to a close with a profile of Confucius, who is credited as the first Chinese thinker to take a systematic philosophical approach to issues of social, political and ethical importance. Born during the chaotic Spring and Autumn period of Chinese history, Confucius believed that harmony could be promoted and achieved through the examples of sage rulers. He was also a innovative teacher, and tried to instill his principles of moral excellence in Chinas elite, but died without seeing his vision for his nation come to pass. However, his philosophies would eventually form the bedrock of Chinese culture, with many of his principles of tradition surviving to this day

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: The former steeplejack examines the history of the iron and steel industries, beginning with a visit to Ironbridge Gorge in Shropshire. Fred moves on to the Black Country, where he learns how the anchor for the ill-fated Titanic was made, before getting the chance to drive the biggest steam-powered rolling mill engine he has ever seen

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Liz McIvor presents a documentary examining excursion trains, which became popular from the 1840s onwards, with tourists taking day trips and holidays, and seeing parts of the country they had never seen before. Some trains were set up to satisfy the demand to witness public executions, whereas others transported people to horse racing and sporting events. Working-class northerners had access to the Lake District, however Lakeland resident William Wordsworth was initially unhappy about the new visitors

programme.title: Thatcher: A Very British Revolution
programme.desc: The rise and dramatic downfall of Margaret Thatcher, as told by members of her inner circle, who reveal how a political outsider won power and came to dominate the 1980s. The first episode charts how she managed to become a prominent political figure and survived the controversial policy that saw the press label her the milk snatcher, before challenging Edward Heath for the leadership of the Conservative Party

programme.title: The Jet Stream and Us
programme.desc: Documentary examining the influence that the jet stream - a ribbon of fast-moving air high up in the atmosphere - has on everyday weather. Here, scientists explain the effects the phenomenon has had on climate and discuss what could happen should it change its pattern of behaviour

programme.title: Bhasker Patel Remembers - Brothers in Trouble
programme.desc: Actor Bhasker Patel looks back on his experience of playing Gholam in the 1995 film, Brothers In Trouble. The picture tells the story of an all-male household of illegal Pakistani immigrants living in the Midlands, and how their lives are affected when Mary, a pregnant local prostitute, moves into the house. Bhaskar talks about his memories of the cast and production, recalling the critical reaction at the time

programme.title: Brothers in Trouble
programme.desc: Affected and rather naive drama following the fortunes of a group of illegal immigrants struggling to scrape a living in Sixties Britain. The film focuses on Aamir, who travels from Pakistan in a vegetable crate and takes up a variety of unskilled jobs to support his family. Living in a house with 16 other men, he strikes up a friendship with a student who becomes his guide to British life. But the groups lives are thrown into upheaval when a pregnant Irish woman moves into their household. Om Puri, Pavan Malhotra and Angeline Ball star

programme.title: Timeshift
programme.sub-title: Crime and Punishment - The Story of Capital Punishment
programme.desc: Documentary examining the history of capital punishment, including the protocol of public execution and the science of hanging. Archive information reveals the offences that resulted in the gallows and how children as young as seven were hanged

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: The former steeplejack examines the history of the iron and steel industries, beginning with a visit to Ironbridge Gorge in Shropshire. Fred moves on to the Black Country, where he learns how the anchor for the ill-fated Titanic was made, before getting the chance to drive the biggest steam-powered rolling mill engine he has ever seen

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Liz McIvor presents a documentary examining excursion trains, which became popular from the 1840s onwards, with tourists taking day trips and holidays, and seeing parts of the country they had never seen before. Some trains were set up to satisfy the demand to witness public executions, whereas others transported people to horse racing and sporting events. Working-class northerners had access to the Lake District, however Lakeland resident William Wordsworth was initially unhappy about the new visitors

programme.title: The Story of Welsh Art
programme.desc: Huw Stephens reveals how, as the 20th century dawned, artists found radical new ways to depict Wales, pushing themselves to extremes and redefining what art could be. His venture takes him to the National Museum Wales in Cardiff, Bardsey Island off the Llyn Peninsula, Colwyn Bay and Swansea

programme.title: Thatcher: A Very British Revolution
programme.desc: The rise and dramatic downfall of Margaret Thatcher, as told by members of her inner circle, who reveal how a political outsider won power and came to dominate the 1980s. The first episode charts how she managed to become a prominent political figure and survived the controversial policy that saw the press label her the milk snatcher, before challenging Edward Heath for the leadership of the Conservative Party

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It
programme.desc: Mark Wright and team-mates Karla Pryce and Asher Edwards step in to help a family whose home was devastated by a flood. A year later, their living room is still a dumping ground, and the kitchen is chaotic. From a playful coffee table to ingenious kitchen storage, the team brings joy, style and order back to the home

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden and Alan Carr take on their first project - transforming the old dining room into a Tuscan living room. After failing to reach an agreement on the colour scheme, the duo discover the windows of their 17th-century home are unsalvageable and must be made from scratch. Luckily another old feature can be saved, and with the help of Scott the DIY duo restore the original chestnut ceiling beams. Away from the work, the pair venture out into the Apuan Alps and face their fears - taking flight with a 1,500m long zip wire over the spectacular Lake Vagli

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson explores the countryside of North and West Yorkshire with a couple from a market town in West Sussex. Jules has a superb selection of properties to show them, and key to their wish list is a big workshop where its hoped a woodworking hobby will become a profession

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.sub-title: Can Dads Old Coins Fund My Wedding?
programme.desc: Auctioneer James Broad and restorer Lauren Wood scour a Birmingham home, unearthing global treasures and reviving worn pieces to make them auction-ready. By selling items owned by her late parents, owner Ana hopes to write a new chapter in her life, including planning a romantic cruise ship wedding to her partner Michael. Chinese vases, Scottish whisky and an Egyptian revival chest are all marked for auction by JB, a large wooden chest requires Laurens attention and her unorthodox method of using grit and teabags produces a surprising outcome

programme.title: The Answer Run
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the fast-paced quiz show where three couples face a series of 50/50 questions which hurtle down the Answer Run towards them

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Quiz show in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize. Presented by Alexander Armstrong and Angela Rippon

programme.title: Stacey and Joe
programme.sub-title: This Could Go Really Well or Really Badly
programme.desc: Spring has sprung at Pickle Cottage, the chicks are hatching and Stacey and Sam wrestle with the ever-growing vegetable patch. Joe ropes in Rex, Rose and Belle to help make the perfect Mothers Day picnic and Zach and Leighton are tasked with cooking dinner, but will they stick to the plan or get distracted by crisps and energy drinks?

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: Dwayne is under pressure when Ashton exposes his deepest secrets to the entire school, while Nisha is conflicted when her maternal and professional instincts clash. programme.sub-title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island: The Final Flare

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda and Alan face their biggest challenge yet as they tackle the garden. The patch of land on the side of the mountain has been untouched for over a decade, and with no idea on what plants thrive in the Tuscan terrain, the pals seek help from gardening oracle Warrie Price, who has spent over 30 years cultivating a 15-acre oasis. Keen to inject authentic Tuscan design, Alan visits the ancient town of Impruneta in search of terracotta pots. Amanda calls in her green-fingered mum, but gets more than she bargained for when her parent takes a liking to a member of staff at a nearby garden centre

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Nicki Chapman is in Devon, house-hunting with a pair of entrepreneurial sisters who dream of creating their own glamping business

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: Auctioneer Izzie Balmer and restorer Saf Fakir help brother and sister Rita and Gary clear their parents former home and raise money to afford care home costs for their dad who has dementia. Izzie finds some sporting memorabilia to sell at auction and Saf restores a 1960s sideboard and some dining chairs

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Alex Jones and Vernon Kay present the magazine show, with celebrity guests and stories of interest from around the UK

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: There is drama ahead in Walford following an unexpected surprise, things are looking up for Harry, while Priya and Ravi face more hurdles

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Paul and Sam from Bradford enter the workshop with a handmade brass and gold-leaf miniature drum kit clock that no longer ticks, experts Pete Woods and Steve Fletcher put their skills together to bring the timepiece back to its former glory. Paper conservator Angelina Bakalarou meets Rachel from Devon who brings in a picture of her great aunt Maud who was the nanny to the children of President Kennedy. The photo of her and the children was gifted by Jackie Kennedy and is in need of restoration. Kirsten Ramsay welcomes Jean, a former Barnardos child, who brings along a wax statuette that was gifted to her in recognition of her fundraising efforts for the charity that has been melted by the radiator. Nat, originally from Venezuela, brings in a cuatro - a traditional four-stringed instrument central to her countrys heritage - for luthier Julyan Wallis to repair

programme.title: Panorama
programme.desc: Secret filming by Panorama reveals evidence of racism, misogyny and officers revelling in the use of force at Charing Cross, one of Londons busiest police stations. After the murder of Sarah Everard by a serving police officer, the Metropolitan Police promised change and says that since 2022 more than 1,400 officers have either been dismissed or have resigned following a clamp down on what it calls rogue officers. Panoramas evidence suggests that a toxic culture still exists inside the Met and that racist and misogynistic attitudes havent been eliminated, but have been driven underground

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Nolan Live
programme.desc: Stephen Nolan probes the issues that matter to the people of Northern Ireland, focusing on the stories of the week and the people making the headlines in lively debates, with viewers sending in their questions via text, email and social media

programme.title: MOTD: UEFA Champions League
programme.desc: Action from the matchday two fixtures in the league phase, including Bodø/Glimt v Tottenham Hotspur at Aspmyra Stadion, Galatasaray v Liverpool at Rams Park and Union Saint-Gilloise v Newcastle United. Glimt and Spurs met in a rematch of their UEFA Europa League semi-final last term, which the Londoners won. Elsewhere, Liverpool faced a potentially difficult assignment away to the Turkish champions and Newcastle took on a Belgian side that impressed in matchday one away to PSV Eindhoven

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Host Rob Brydon and captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack welcome Angellica Bell, Bob Mortimer, Suggs and Holly Willoughby to the comedy panel show on which the teams reveal extraordinary stories about themselves. But are they telling the truth, or are they making it all up?

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.sub-title: Horrible Histories: Horrid Henry VIII Special
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson stars in an episode focusing on the life of the English monarch, including his struggles with his boring dad Henry VII, before becoming king himself, and going through wives like most people go through toothbrushes. Plus, stories about Ottoman leader Suleiman the Magnificent in Turkey and Emperor Zhengde in China

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Kathryn Drysdale stars in an episode focusing on the life of the Egyptian queen Cleopatra, meeting her as she clashes with her brother, seizes power and hooks up with Roman leaders Julius Caesar and Mark Antony. Plus, the thoughts of famous Chinese philosopher Confucius, and the less glamorous side of life in Rome

programme.title: The Catch Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The presenters search for the worlds best four-seat supercar, pitting the Aston Martin Rapide against the Porsche Panamera Turbo and Maserati Quattroporte in a series of unusual challenges in the south of England. Harry Potter star Rupert Grint and ex-Formula One driver Rubens Barrichello each do a lap in the Reasonably Priced Car and Richard Hammond puts the Chevrolet Camaro SS and Mercedes E63 AMG through their paces on the test track

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Journalist Tir Dhondy investigates the disappearance of Sarm Heslop, who went missing from a luxury Caribbean charter yacht in 2021. Tire retraces Sarms last known movements and tracks down two boat captains whose vessels were moored near the yacht she vanished from. Also, she gets to question Ryan Banes, Sarms boyfriend, account of what happened what happened through his lawyer David Cattie

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy meets with island police and is given CCTV footage that has never been released, showing Sarms last known movements with her boyfriend, Ryan Bane

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy searches for the yacht Sarm vanished from, and tracks down Ryan Banes ex-wife, hearing first-hand about her experiences while married to him

programme.title: People Just Do Nothing: Big in Japan
programme.desc: After Brentfords largest pirate radio station has ended, the boys from Kurupt FM find their way to Japan on an epic adventure in search of fame and fortune. But is Japan really ready for Kurupt FM? Comedy based on the BBC series, starring Allan Mustafa, Steve Stamp and Asim Chaudhry

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The nervous energy is palpable as 12 brand new queens enter the werk room to meet their fellow competitors and judge supremo RuPaul for the very first time. In this race, nothing is predictable, and in their very first challenge, Ru has an extra-special challenge in store for the queens. In a Drag Race UK first, the queens display show-stopping looks as they attend the biggest night in fashion - the star-studded Brit Gala. Comedian and presenter Joel Dommett guests on the judging panel, alongside Michelle Visage and Alan Carr

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The presenters search for the worlds best four-seat supercar, pitting the Aston Martin Rapide against the Porsche Panamera Turbo and Maserati Quattroporte in a series of unusual challenges in the south of England. Harry Potter star Rupert Grint and ex-Formula One driver Rubens Barrichello each do a lap in the Reasonably Priced Car and Richard Hammond puts the Chevrolet Camaro SS and Mercedes E63 AMG through their paces on the test track

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy doesnt want to see Jamma anymore, so when Jamma meets a magical stranger who offers to unburden him from his clownish ways to win Guy back, he decides to take the deal and is transformed. Guy has a photo shoot for his book cover, but doesnt want to look boring, so Isaac offers to style him in exchange for free therapy. Comedy, co-written by and starring Mawaan Rizwan, with Russell Tovey

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: The new Jamma is reliable and consistent - he wants to respect Guys boundaries, but also needs Saifs address from Guy so he can try to reconnect with his father. Winnies dad is visiting for some quality father-daughter bonding, but shes not yet come out as straight to him and asks Isaac to play along. Comedy, starring Mawaan Rizwan, Russell Tovey and Emily Lloyd-Saini

programme.title: Laugh Lessons
programme.desc: Larger than life and fun loving TikTok star Akafi battles with his insecure inner voice, which is hellbent on destroying his self-confidence as he gets ready for a date

programme.title: Bad Influencer: The Great Insta Con
programme.desc: The rise and fall of internet wellness guru Belle Gibson, who cultivated an adoring online following with the story that she had successfully treated her own cancer by eating a plant-based diet and using alternative natural therapies. There was one major problem with Belles story - she never had cancer

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.sub-title: Horrible Histories: Gorgeous George III Special
programme.desc: The life of the monarch, following George from a young unpopular king to a much-loved figure some 60 years later and checking out a bit of his court life along the way. Plus, the programme looks at some of the words English borrowed from India, and the Battles of the Day team give their unique insight into the American Revolution. Simon Farnaby stars

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: The life of the English tribal queen, following her as she turns against her Roman masters and unleashes her forces on Colchester, St Albans and London. Plus, Roman emperors Caligula and Nero dish out their own unique brand of imperial nastiness. Starring Lorna Watson

programme.desc: A round-up of the days news

programme.sub-title: This Could Go Really Well or Really Badly

Joe ropes in Rex, Rose and Belle to help make the perfect Mothers Day picnic and Zach and Leighton are tasked with cooking dinner, but will they stick to the plan or get distracted by crisps and energy drinks?

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: Dwayne is under pressure when Ashton exposes his deepest secrets to the entire school, while Nisha is conflicted when her maternal and professional instincts clash. programme.title: Charlie Coopers Myth Country
programme.desc: The actor travels to Wales, the land of dragons and song, on a mission to discover if King Arthur was a real man or just a myth and if theres any truth behind this treasure story. programme.title: Love Monster
programme.desc: Love Monster, Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny and Bad Idea Puppy arrive at Elder Kittens house with a cart full of decorating things. Its Makeover Day, and they want to make over Elder Kittens living room while he gets a relaxing makeover himself at the Fluffytown spa. When they finish, Love Monster thinks its very different from Elder Kittens usual style. He starts to wonder whether Elder Kitten will be good surprised or bad surprised. Just then, Elder Kitten returns from his spa day. Bad Idea Puppy and Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny show him his new living room and explain that they decorated with the best bright things they could think of. As Elder Kitten looks on a little unsure, Love Monster asks him whether he loves it. Elder Kitten is a little lost for words and, not wanting to hurt their feelings, he simply agrees with them that its bright and very different. Love Monster can tell that Elder Kitten doesnt like it, and eventually Elder Kitten gently admits that its not really his style. The friends realise that they got so excited that they just did the makeover how they would like it but not how Elder Kitten would like it. They apologise, but Elder Kitten says its okay and gives them a hug. Tiniest Fluffiest Bunny asks how they can make it up to him, and Elder Kitten suggests that they make over their makeover in his favourite paint colour. As they get to work, Elder Kitten spots one of their paw prints in paint on the floor covers and has an idea. Later, the room is decorated but with a border of colourful paw prints around the middle. Now hell always think of his favourite bright things even when theyre not there. Sometimes, the brightest surprises are best when you think of your friends.

programme.title: Timmy Time

programme.title: Big Cook Little Cook

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild

programme.title: Whats in Your Bag?

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Kika is a golden Labrador and a guide dog for her owner, Dr Amit, who is blind, which means he cannot see. She is trained to use her supersight to help Dr Amit do as many things as he can by himself. Together, they make the best team! Dr Amit and Kika have an important mission to pick up a surprise cake and some party hats from the supermarket for Aunty Ninas birthday. Kika has lots of friends at the supermarket. But first, she must use her supersight - and the help of her tiny friends, the road cones - to guide Dr Amit past the roadworks and keep him safely on the pavement. Then she has to help Dr Amit pick up the cake from the supermarket bakery and find the party hats. But the party hats have been moved! Kika must use all her powers to find them. Just wait until the rest of Dog Squad hear about this!

programme.title: Maddies Do You Know?

programme.desc: Two-part documentary examining Taylor Swifts rise to fame, from country music prodigy to pop phenomenon. Starting from the beginning of her career, teenage Taylor emerges as a country prodigy and slowly gains fame until the moment Kanye West interrupts her speech at an award ceremony, propelling the young country starlet to a different order of global fame. The underdog is born. Her response to adversity is to write a song about it, take control of the narrative and bounce back. But just as Taylor is on the verge of going even more stratospheric, shes hit by an online cancellation that surely exceeds even her powers of reinvention. How will she bounce back from this?

Kirstie Allsopp is across the border in West Yorkshire with Ollie and Emma, who have a £500,000 budget for the rural good life for them and their two dogs. Plans to move into their dream home fallen through twice. Can Kirstie make it third time lucky?

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud follows more of Britains most ambitious self-building projects, as intrepid individuals attempt to design and construct the home of their dreams. After 40 years living largely in the southeast of England, artist Sarah is returning to her roots in the northeast with towering ambitions for an exposed, three-acre plot that shes bought at auction in the Durham Dales. She wants to create a radical home and creative hub combined, including a studio and gallery for displaying and selling art. With her budget of £330,000, Sarah hopes to build with a super-sustainable yet still relatively unknown and hard-to-predict material - hempcrete. Left exposed throughout the interior, the hempcrete will provide a dramatic earthy look, but this relies on the building process going perfectly. But, just a few months into Sarahs eight-month schedule, her plan to move in before winter is scuppered as her inexperience as a project manager starts to show. With material costs going through the roof, and her budget doing likewise, selling her one-bed holiday cottage looks like the only way to keep building. As the critical hemp process gets going, and proves increasingly tortuous and unpredictable, the success of Sarahs project hangs in the balance

programme.desc: Homer is forced to eat bland food after he burns his taste buds while trying to copy a fire-eating street performer. He becomes a regular at Springfield Elementarys canteen where he learns a new parenting technique to try out on Bart and Lisa - but its overbearing nature leads to disaster. Meanwhile, Marge enjoys a sauna she discovers in the basement

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Trouble arises when Amy learns that Sheldon has applied for a one-way mission to colonise Mars. Meanwhile, Leonard surprises Penny with a gift, and Raj decides to snoop around Emilys flat after she is called back to work during their evening together. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is upset when a magazine fails to mention him in an article about the paper he co-wrote with Sheldon. Meanwhile, a power cut at Mrs Wolowitzs home leads to a final family dinner in her honour. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads for West Babylon, New York, to help the inexperienced owners of restaurant Classic American deal with their escalating debts. The chef struggles to cope with disorganised staff and an unappealing menu, but quickly realises the real problem lies in the kitchen, where a lack of leadership and communication is causing serious trouble

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Haunted by questions, John Paul digs into what really happened on the night when Bobby died. Clare wont stop until she gets her money back, and secrets continue to tear a family apart

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Tonys plea hearing takes shocking twists and turns, while Dodger comes across some damning evidence. And Vicky wants to know what really happened to Robbie

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Down City, a restaurant in Providence, Rhode Island. The no-nonsense chef struggles to persuade hot-headed owner Abby to make his suggested changes, and a confrontation results in him being thrown out of the building in the middle of a dinner service. The eaterys co-owner and financier begs Gordon to return, but his success hinges on his ability to win Abby over

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: The inaugural Commitment Ceremony sees all nine couples meet the experts for the first time. For some, its an opportunity to showcase their success, but two couples clash

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge and Homer rent an apartment in an affluent area so their children can have a good education when Springfield Elementary is rated the worst school in the state. Bart wastes no time in establishing a bad-boy persona, and increases Lisas popularity by telling people she knows a pop star. With the voice of Elliot Page (Juno)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: An argument between Leonard and Sheldon over the ending of a Harry Potter book affects Amy and Pennys living arrangements. Meanwhile, Howard goes on a trip to Las Vegas with Bernadette and asks Raj to keep an eye on his mother while he is away

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Penny celebrate Valentines Day, but their evening takes a turn for the worse when the latters ex-boyfriend proposes to his girlfriend in the same restaurant. Meanwhile, Sheldon enlists the help of his assistant Alex to find the perfect gift for Amy

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire becomes a neighbourhood vigilante in the hope of stopping a motorist who has begun speeding through local streets. Jay teaches Manny to ride a bike, before discovering Gloria also needs lessons, while Mitch and Cameron befriend zany stranger Barry. Guest starring James Marsden (X-Men)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitchell makes a disturbing discovery following an awkward encounter with an old high-school flame, and wonders whether he unknowingly fathered a child in his straight days. Feeling intellectually inferior to Alex, Phil and Claire try to enjoy a subtitled film, while Jay regrets getting on the wrong side of Gloria

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny gets fired from the movie, prompting her to take a serious look at her life. Raj receives advice from Sheldon after he sees Emily on a date with another man at the cinema, while Howards mother breaks her leg. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon becomes upset about his career, the destruction of the comic-book store and Leonard and Pennys future living arrangements. Elsewhere, Howard is unable to keep hold of a carer for his mother. Comedy, staring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Amy are forced to take an unexpected road trip to Arizona to pick up Sheldon after his epic railway journey ends in chaos. Meanwhile, Howard finds Stuarts relationship with his mother strange, and Penny has an interview for a sales job at Bernadettes workplace. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is forced to teach a course at the university, and Howard surprises the gang when he decides to enrol on it. Meanwhile, Amy plays Penny and Bernadette off against each other while the tension brews over Pennys new job. Comedy, guest starring Regina King (Southland), with Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: To track down an infamous arms dealer, Peralta and Jeffords go undercover at an illegal gambling club, but when Captain Holt tries to coach them in the art of poker, his addiction resurfaces. Boyle buys a food truck that was formerly the site of a brutal double murder, to the horror of his only investor in the project, Santiago. Hitchcock and Scully have an unusual challenge for Dia. Cop comedy, starring Andy Samberg

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Vulture makes an unwelcome return to Peralta and Santiagos lives, threatening to swoop in and take something important away from them. Meanwhile, Boyle and Diaz must track down kidnapped NYPD horse Sergeant Peanut Butter, and Holt challenges Jeffords to be less image-conscious. Cop comedy, starring Andy Samberg

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer suffers a bout of incontinence and has to wear a nappy, forcing Marge to ask eccentric boffin Professor Frink to help determine the cause of his condition. With the use of a dream machine, Frink breaks into Homers subconscious mind where a string of insecurities are exposed, including one involving his late mother

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mr Burns gets rid of his power plant employees and replaces them all with robots - with the exception of Homer. But trouble soon brews when the mechanised workers develop rebellious tendencies. With the guest voice of Brent Spiner (best known as Star Trek: The Next Generations android Data)

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: The inaugural Commitment Ceremony sees all nine couples meet the experts for the first time. For some, its an opportunity to showcase their success, but two couples clash

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos, featuring weddings, space and sci-fi fans

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Strong Arms of the Ma
programme.desc: Marge is mugged at the supermarket and develops a fear of venturing outdoors - until she starts a fitness regimen with Homers old weights and develops muscles guaranteed to deter any would-be assailant

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer takes Ned Flanders advice and starts praying regularly, hoping God will lend a sympathetic ear and make it possible for him to buy a better home. Marge warns that his materialistic attitude may incur divine retribution, but he turns a deaf ear - until a flood of biblical proportions hits Springfield

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Clare sets out for revenge, while the walls close in on Jez, and a resident is determined to end their familys reign of destruction

programme.title: Hollyoaks Unwrapped
programme.desc: Actor Kieron Richardson gives viewers a behind-the-scenes look at the soap. There are also features, interviews, games, spoilers and set secrets ahead of the shows 30th anniversary

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Maître d Fred Sirieix and his team prepare once again to play Cupid at their Manchester restaurant. Essex-born cleaning fanatic Fleur is paired with Essex boy Louis, who reveals he has been working as a high-end escort. Thirty five-year-old Ian, from Co Durham, is full of contradictions, which include working as a gas fitter while also running an art gallery with a champagne bar. it remains to be seen if similarly-aged medical lab assistant Michaela could be the woman to love all of his quirks

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Its Experts Week, and the newlyweds face their first set of challenges specifically designed to strengthen and develop their marriages. Charlenes intimacy workshop spices things up for some of the new couples, while one brides patience wears thin with her new groom

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Interactive documentary in which singletons meet up with possible partners from the internet for the first time. This weeks participants include Amanda, who is looking for her future husband, and recruitment consultant Siofra, whose search for someone with personality as well as looks turns up a male model who used to be a pilot. At the end of their restaurant meal, the couples decide whether they want to take things further, and if the answer is no, the next date sitting opposite them could be a viewer

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson welcomes 24-year-old Sian from Norfolk, a petrol head who wants to find a man she can love more than her beloved car, and 33-year-old fashion entrepreneur Tansel from London. He is looking to settle down and hopes that losing ignoring the clothes for once will help him find the right girl

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on shows including SAS: Who Dares Wins, Dragons Den, Three Families, Headspace: Guide to Sleep, Secret Crush, Lego Masters USA and This Morning. They also proffer their thoughts on a BBC News report about taking holidays abroad as the pandemic rules on travel are relaxed. First shown in May 2021

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Its Experts Week, and the newlyweds face their first set of challenges specifically designed to strengthen and develop their marriages. Charlenes intimacy workshop spices things up for some of the new couples, while one brides patience wears thin with her new groom

programme.title: Below Deck
programme.desc: A new crew member is thrown in at the deep end with social-media-addicted guests, and Barbie and Kyle struggle after taking their relationship to the next level

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family takes part in a new reality TV show set in the 19th century, which proves unpopular with viewers, prompting the producers to try a series of increasingly desperate and dangerous ploys in a bid to boost ratings. With the guest voice of former boxer Larry Holmes

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer is the target of a mysterious murder attempt at a sauna, so Chief Wiggum orders Sideshow Bobs early release from prison to help identify the culprit. Featuring the guest voice of Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard finds out that he has a half-brother, Sheldon and Amy have a platonic sleepover, and Penny gets an offer to audition for a Kevin Smith film. American comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj is asked to create a message on the off-chance a Nasa mission discovers alien life, and the guys fight over what he should do. Penny contemplates a return to acting. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco and Kunal Nayyar

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard questions his engineering abilities when he and Sheldon cant get a toy drone to fly. A cancelled flight almost stops Leonard from giving the commencement address at his former high school, while Raj pits his parents against each other when his father cuts him off financially

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Frazer witnesses an accident on the way to work, but is hit by the man she is trying to help. Hollis is anxious to talk to everyone about possible stress problems

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: A butler in a 1930s aristocratic household has dedicated himself to serving his master, putting duty above all else and repressing his affection for the housekeeper, who also happens to be in love with him. On the outbreak of war, the noblemans Nazi sympathies come to light, marking a change of heart in the old servant, who looks back with misgivings about the loyalty that may have cost him dearly. Period drama, with Anthony Hopkins, Emma Thompson and James Fox

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: A long-serving marshal, who has done his utmost to the keep peace in the town of Medicine Bend, looks forward to a reconciliation with his estranged wife, a touring musical star. Just as she arrives in town, three notorious criminals show up and start causing trouble - and the lawman has to decide whether to hang up his guns for his wifes sake or do his duty. Western, with Randolph Scott, Angela Lansbury, Jean Parker and Warner Anderson

programme.title: The Blue Lamp
programme.desc: A veteran policeman gives a new recruit the benefit of his experience, while two crooks plan a series of robberies. When the two duos meet, the older constable is shot and killed, and his protege sets out to bring the killers to justice. Police drama, starring Jack Warner in a role he would reprise for TV series Dixon of Dock Green. With Jimmy Hanley and Dirk Bogarde

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: In 1920s Paris, exiled Russians claim they have found the daughter of the last Tsar, who was originally believed to have been killed with the rest of her family. She is taken into the care of a General and groomed until she can convince Anastasias cousin Prince Paul that she is genuinely the tsarina and inherit a fortune. Historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Ingrid Bergman, and Yul Brynner

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
programme.desc: Forrest Tucker, a criminal since the age of 15, has escaped from most of the prisons that tried to hold him. At the end of his career, he has become a gentleman bank robber. However, cop John Hunt becomes determined to catch him. Fact-based crime drama, starring the late Robert Redford, with Casey Affleck and Sissy Spacek

programme.title: Tombstone
programme.desc: Renowned marshal Wyatt Earp becomes a professional gambler in the town of Tombstone, but is forced out of his retirement to take on a gang of hellraising villains no one else is prepared to stand up to. Joining forces with his brothers and drunken gunslinger Doc Holliday, he gets ready to face them in a showdown at the OK Corral. Western, starring Kurt Russell, Val Kilmer, Bill Paxton, Sam Elliott, Michael Biehn and Charlton Heston

programme.title: On the Come Up
programme.desc: Brianna Bri Jackson is a 16 year-old girl with dreams of becoming a legendary rapper, while her mother attempts to make ends meet after losing her job. Musical drama directed by Sanaa Lathan, starring Jamila C Gray, DaVine Joy Randolph and Mike Epps

programme.title: Climax
programme.desc: A group of dancers have gathered in a deserted building to rehearse, but someone has spiked the sangria. Writer/director Gaspar Noes psychological horror, starring Sofia Boutella, Kiddy Smile and Romain Guillermic. In French with English subtitles

programme.title: Payroll
programme.desc: The widow of an armoured car driver swears revenge on the criminals who killed him - leading them to turn on each other. Crime drama, starring Michael Craig and Billie Whitelaw

programme.title: Three Hours to Kill
programme.desc: After being framed for murder and narrowly escaping the town mob, Jim Guthrie returns three years later to find the real killer. Western, starring Dana Andrews and Dianne Foster

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: A cavalry officer has to avoid showing preferential treatment when the son he has not seen for 15 years is posted to his fort as a cadet. His estranged wife also turns up wanting to take the boy away, but he is forced to put duty before his family when called on to rescue children kidnapped by Apaches on the Mexican border. John Fords Western, with John Wayne, Maureen OHara, Ben Johnson and J Carrol Naish

programme.title: Ten Tall Men
programme.desc: A Foreign Legion sergeant learns a tribal leader is planning to launch an attack on a remote fort, and leads a small band of soldiers into the desert to distract the enemy hordes. However, he soon discovers a more dangerous threat - the Legions various foes are plotting to join forces. Comedy adventure, starring Burt Lancaster, Jody Lawrence and Kieron Moore

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: The crew and passengers of a cargo plane are left stranded in the Gobi desert after a crash. They embark on a desperate plan to return to civilisation - by building a new plane out of the wreckage of the old one. Action adventure remake, starring Dennis Quaid, Tyrese Gibson, Giovanni Ribisi, Miranda Otto and Hugh Laurie

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: The wisecracking anti-hero meets Russell, a gifted youngster living in an orphanage but being pursued by a heavily armed cyborg from the future known as Cable. The mercenary soon joins forces with Bedlam, Shatterstar, Domino and other powerful mutants to protect young Russell from villainous Cable and his advanced weaponry. Futuristic action comedy, co-written, co-produced by and starring Ryan Reynolds, with Josh Brolin, Julian Dennison and Zazie Beetz

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: While exploring space for new worlds, a probe belonging to the Life Foundation discovers a comet covered in symbiotic lifeforms. Following the probes return to Earth, journalist Eddie Brock investigates sinister trials being carried out by the corporation, and after being infected by an alien symbiote, develops superhuman strength and power. Fantasy adventure, starring Tom Hardy and Riz Ahmed

programme.title: The Outsiders
programme.desc: A teenager from the wrong side of the tracks leads a high-school gang in a revenge battle with the citys rich kids who caused the death of a friend. Francis Ford Coppolas drama, with Matt Dillon, C Thomas Howell, Tom Cruise, Patrick Swayze, Ralph Macchio, Emilio Estevez and Rob Lowe

However, his new-found happiness is threatened when his face starts to appear on wanted posters. Western, starring Fred MacMurray, Lin McCarthy, Alan Baxter and James Coburn

As he seeks vengeance, he finds himself up against a sadistic officer wreaking havoc in the surrounding area. Roland Emmerichs action adventure, starring Mel Gibson, Jason Isaacs, Heath Ledger and Joely Richardson.

programme.desc: Jessica attends a dinner party thrown by a famous artist, who is found dead the following morning. As the police arrest his maid for the crime, Cabot Coves resident sleuth sets out to paint a picture of what really happened on that fateful night - and take the accused woman out of the frame. Angela Lansbury stars, with Tom Bosley, William Windom and Dick Sargent

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A conversation with Walter Morgan at a formal event suggests to Carrie he holds key information about several murders, including that of her sister. The death of a tennis player reveals a link between the lawyer and the previous sniper calls, and when Morgan develops an unhealthy interest in Carrie, she must decide whether to form a friendship with him to solve the mystery of her sisters death

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: The team investigates a murder committed 10 years previously after a courier carrying important documents is killed. The victim was in possession of a package that allegedly contained proof of a convicted murderers innocence and planned to deliver it to the authorities. However, the case is complicated when the detectives discover the prisoner was bribed to plead guilty - leading them to a wealthy man campaigning to become a senator. Crime drama, guest starring Mark Moses, with Nathan Fillion and Stana Katic

programme.desc: Professor Amy Winslow heads to Seattle to give a lecture. When a tech genius dies, she suspects foul play. However, when local cops shut her out, her detective Travis joins forces with Amy. Thriller, starring Jill Wagner, Kristoffer Polaha and Robin Thomas

After the first elimination, the two remaining players battle to reach the Super Catchphrase round, where one of them could win £50,000 for the charity of their choice

programme.title: Deal or No Deal

programme.title: The 1% Club
programme.desc: Quiz hosted by Lee Mack in which the questions have nothing to do with remembering facts, but are all about logic and common sense. A hundred contestants begin every show, but who will make it to the end and answer a question only one per cent of the country can get right - and win up to £100,000?

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Rosemary manipulates Kate when stepping up her campaign against Perdy. Andy receives his decree nisi, leaving Jo in a celebratory mood - but money worries dampen her spirits.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Grayson is presented with Perdys note by Rosemary but doesnt know what to believe. Katie chides Jo over her lack of engagement ring. A face from the past returns.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Paul drives like a madman to meet Liam and spill the beans about his girlfriend moonlighting as an escort girl - but his erratic driving ends in a horrendous car smash.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: As Pauls life hangs in the balance, Carla and Liam keep a tearful vigil at his bedside, while Michelle rushes to the hospital - only to arrive too late.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: The GP is left holding the baby after upsetting the new childminder, but luckily Mike agrees to look after James at short notice. However, Louisa is not happy with the arrangement and an argument erupts between the newlyweds just as their guests, Dennis and Karen Dodds, arrive for dinner - and thats only the first of the evenings problems. Meanwhile, Ruth is roped into taking part in a phone-in programme on Radio Portwenn and unwittingly answers a call from PC Penhale, who wants to know how to make friends in the village

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Matron is forced to change her plans after a tragic turn of events and decides to withdraw her resignation. Nurse Taylor grows closer to Jeff as they tackle an unusual medical emergency, but later finds herself confronted by an angry Frankie. Harpers money-saving schemes backfire in spectacular fashion, while an argument over a patients health sparks off a chain of events which leaves Gordons life hanging in the balance. Medical drama starring Wendy Craig, Amy Robbins, Robert Daws and Zoie Kennedy

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A handsome new locum wins Maggies heart but soon falls out of favour with the locals when a misdiagnosis results in tragedy. A display of courage by Andy reconciles him with Gina, and Greengrasss bike hire business turns out to be seriously flawed _ much to Ventresss discomfort. Rural drama, starring Kazia Pelka and Bill Maynard

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Greengrass embarks on yet another new career, this time trying to earn a crust as a racehorse trainer after a suspicious death at a local stables leaves a window of opportunity. Meanwhile, former copper Blaketons well-honed instincts alert him to council corruption. Nostalgic rural drama, starring Bill Maynard, Derek Fowlds and Jason Durr

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Rosemary tries to explain her actions to Grayson, though his fury increases as he realises the extent of her campaign. Elsewhere, theres a surprise in store for Jo.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Ken is down in the dumps when it seems no one wants anything to do with him - so Denise makes a pass at her vulnerable ex. Leanne finds herself the centre of gossip.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Ken goes home to make his peace with Deirdre - just as she is toasting the single life on a night out with the girls. The Connors prepare to leave for the funeral in Ireland.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Cora makes a discovery that throws the inheritance issue into chaos, and Mary is prompted to keep Matthew waiting for an answer to his proposal. Robert arranges for Mrs Patmore to see an eye specialist, and OBrien digs up more compromising information about Bates, but the Earls response comes as a surprise. Thomas leaves the Abbey and Mary exacts vengeance on Edith for her treachery, while the household is rocked by a shocking announcement. Drama, starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: A secret admirer makes Ruth feel a little uncomfortable when he places a red rose on her car windscreen and then leaves a birthday cake on her kitchen table while shes at the radio station, and when matters take a turn for the worse, Martin has no choice but to take drastic action. Meanwhile, Bert is furious when one of Louisas pupils writes a damning review of his restaurant in the school newspaper, and a new pharmacist arrives in the village. Annabelle Apsion (Shameless) joins the cast

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Bernie reveals a hidden talent, while Phil Bellamy is babysitting Maggie Boltons son Sam, but when he wakes up from a little nap to feed the baby, Sam has gone missing. Rural police drama set in the rustic backwater of Aidensfield, Yorkshire, starring Kazia Pelka and Peter Benson

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A criminals wife commits suicide, making Mike wish he had not been quite so forceful in extracting a confession. Meanwhile, Blaketon has the misfortune of getting mixed up in Greengrasss latest scheme to make a few bob. Rural drama, with Bill Maynard, Derek Fowlds and Michael Angelis

programme.title: Foyles War
programme.desc: Racial tensions erupt in Hastings when a black GI is suspected of murdering a local woman. The victim, an ex-lover of the suspect and the mother of his baby, was staying at a guest house where Samantha is assistant manager, and had been disowned by her family because of her mixed-race child. As Foyle investigates, he is not convinced the soldier could be capable of such a crime, and soon comes up against the might of the US Army as he tries to crack the case. Starring Michael Kitchen, Honeysuckle Weeks, Obi Abili and Charlotte Riley

programme.title: Foyles War
programme.desc: As Foyle prepares to be replaced at the police station and begin retirement, his attention is grabbed by a news story about a man sentenced to hang for high treason, and he decides to take on the case. But with the prisoners execution date approaching, the detective has to work fast to find evidence that will clear him. Meanwhile, Samantha and Adam fight to save Hill House from the town planners determined to demolish it - but disaster soon strikes. Starring Michael Kitchen, Honeysuckle Weeks and Max Brown

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Part one of two. Psychological profiler Tony is assigned to help when a teenagers body is dragged from a lake, while his detective partner Carol visits a celebrity couple being plagued by a stalker. At first the pair find their relationship challenged by having to work apart, but then they find a connection between the dead body and the stalker. Mystery thriller, starring Robson Green and Hermione Norris, with guest appearances by Doon Mackichan and John Michie

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Part two of two. Beths murder has a devastating effect on Amanda Vance, leaving her on the verge of a breakdown, although the tragedy at least provides a wealth of clues for Tony and Carol to follow up. However, it soon becomes clear time is of the essence when another girl with a resemblance to the previous victims goes missing. Mystery thriller, starring Robson Green, Hermione Norris, Doon Mackichan and John Michie

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: It is November 1916, and the family and servants are getting the house ready for a concert to raise funds to treat more casualties from the front. programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Louisa wants Martin to engage more with James, so she arranges for him to take their baby to playgroup, where he has to pair up with a mother and daughter and sing songs. Meanwhile, Al signs up to a dating website, Bert is suspicious when he catches Jennifer in the bathroom with a needle, and Ruth moves into a cottage in the village, but soon has trouble with a grumpy new neighbour (Ronald Pickup)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Ventresss determination to protect a widows home from a gang of louts becomes an all-consuming obsession, while Greengrass gets his fingers burnt attempting to break into the fish and chip industry, little realising what a competitive business it is. Rural drama, starring William Simons and Bill Maynard

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Greengrass befriends a travelling musician (guest star Gary Barlow) who spreads a little disharmony in Aidensfield, while Jackies parents drop in unexpectedly, casting a shadow over her relationship with Mike - and all at once domestic bliss becomes a thing of the past in the Bradley household. With Bill Maynard, Jason Durr and Fiona Dolman

programme.title: Foyles War
programme.desc: Its 1946 and although one war has ended, another is looming as the Iron Curtain falls across Europe. Foyle arrives home from America, where he is wanted in connection with a suspicious suicide, but MI5 offers him a way out. The agency suspects Britains atomic research programme has been infiltrated and wants to recruit him to investigate a Soviet spy ring that could be at work in the heart of London. Detective drama, starring Michael Kitchen, with Honeysuckle Weeks, Ellie Haddington and Dylan Charles

programme.title: Foyles War
programme.desc: The detectives investigation into the death of a nameless Russian leads to a mysterious military facility run by Colonel Harry Galt, a respected soldier with an impeccable war record. However, as Foyle makes inquiries, he realises the deceased was a spy with dangerous connections to British Intelligence. Meanwhile, Sam does her best to help husband Adam during his by-election campaign, but cant help putting her foot in it. Crime drama, starring Michael Kitchen and Honeysuckle Weeks, with Jonathan Hyde and Daniel Weyman

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Part one of two. Psychological thriller, starring Robson Green and Hermione Norris

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger
programme.desc: An old flame of Trivettes appears asking for help, and Walker must come to the rescue

However, he later learns she is a Russian spy who faked her own demise, and now needs his help to foil an international criminal conspiracy out to steal a fortune in bullion. Action thriller, starring Charlie Sheen, Nastassja Kinski and James Gandolfini

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter

However, bringing his former spouse to justice is harder than he anticipated, not least because she has also been targeted by the criminal she is investigating. Action comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Jennifer Aniston, Gio Perez, Joel Garland, Jason Kolotouros and Matt Malloy

programme.title: Southern Fury

He is recruited by the US authorities for a top-secret rescue mission when their ambassador to Serbia is taken hostage by a former general and wanted war criminal during a coup. Action adventure, with Robert Fucilla and Billy Zane

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: Glampsite owners in Portugal face the reality of living off-grid, and at a horse riding centre in France, cameras follow a mother and daughter with grand plans

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: The owners of a glampsite have transport trouble in Portugal. A former art teacher opens a gallery in Spain, while mother-and-daughter equestrians hope to ride out a rough patch

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Erin and JB take on the task of renovating one of the turrets at Chateau de Bourneau and Ben and Billie host their first couples weekend. Nick gets pulled away from urgent renovation to sandblast the entire facade of Chateau des Vieilles Vignes

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: A storm is brewing in western France, putting pressure on Erin and JB to get the windows back into their huge turret renovation before all their efforts might be rained off. At Château la Grande Maison, Ben and Billie have the enormous job of renovating their entrance gatehouse. Elsewhere, Nick and Nicole have only four weeks to make part of their chateau habitable before their babys due date. Narrated by Adjoa Andoh

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contest begins at the Richard III in Middleham, North Yorkshire, a pub run by husband and wife Ken and Sharon, who become suspicious when one couple check out before breakfast. The village is known for its horse racing links, but one of the competitors, Matt Wilson, has a fear of horses, and another couple are concerned at staying above a noisy pub

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit is to the Court House Unique Boutique BandB in Shelsley Walsh, Worcestershire, where hosts Keith and Lisa Shearin hope to impress. On arrival, Ken and Sharon are blown away by their honeymoon suite and the seemingly low price. Suspicions over price fixing drive Matt and Paul to the internet to verify the room rate, where they discover an anomaly, and despite Keiths best efforts at breakfast, Jo and Louis dismiss it as being too fancy

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants travel to Castley Camp in Otley, West Yorkshire, for the third day of the contest, owned by single mum Jo Stevenson and her son Louis. Some of the guests are horrified by stains on their bedding and dust in their room, while an afternoon boot camp fitness session reveals Keiths competitive side. At feedback, Jo is left fuming over the comments about cleanliness and breakfast

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final two days see the contestants staying the night at the Lion and Swan in Congleton, Cheshire, run by owner Paul Whyle and manager Matt Wilson. A dirty bathroom and a waterbed cause upset, while some guests are still fuming about previous negative feedback. However, the worst is left for breakfast, when Sharon reveals she has discovered their rooms online at a higher price than they were told, upsetting Keith and Lisa and leaving the hosts determined to clear their names

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The BandB owners meet for the last time to find out what theyve been paid and to settle some scores. First up are Ken and Sharon from the Richard III, who want to learn more about whats been causing Jo and Louis to lose sleep. Next, Keith and Lisa from the Court House Unique Boutique BandB want to challenge Matt about the allegations of price fixing and vehemently fight their corner. Needless to say, there is tension in the air and axes to grind, before the winner is revealed

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend head to Rochdale to rescue an Opel Manta GTE. The car belongs to former amateur rally driver Alan, who loved his Manta so much he couldnt bear to part with it, even when it went off the road. With Alan becoming a bit of a recluse after developing health problems and losing his wife to cancer, his family and friends hope that the Car S.O.S treatment will be just the thing to bring Alan back out of his shell

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend head to Dorset to pick up a Ford Escort MK2 RS2000, which belongs to carpenter Mike. After his son was involved in a horrific road accident, Mike gave up work and supported him through a four-year recovery. Now, Mikes family want to give something back to offer thanks to such a devoted father by presenting him with his fully restored RS2000

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Phil Spencer catches up with two couples who had high hopes for their first homes. He helped Keon and Zoe search west and south London, while Kirstie Allsopp was with Laura and Phil, who wanted to settle in Bath. What twists and turns have their lives and property hunts taken?

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: In Cambridgeshire, Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer meet house-hunters who want to stay close to home. Single mum-of-two Ali met widower Nick during the first Covid lockdown, and now that they have their first child together, theyre hoping to upsize in the picturesque village of Stilton. Newly-weds Hannah and Hugo need to move out of Hannahs parents house and into their own place - somewhere big enough for Hugos two children to have their own space when they come to stay. Kirstie soon learns that her Stilton search area is smaller than expected but nonetheless shes committed to get Ali and Nick into their first home together. She shows them some great options - but then a previously over-budget dream house comes within their grasp. Phil is also working with a tight search area, but he still finds a lot for Hannah and Hugo to love. Theyre looking for that elusive feeling for their first marital home, but that soon develops into finding the balance between head and heart. Whichever way they go, Phil needs to be as sharp as ever if hes to get them over the threshold

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud follows a project to renovate and extend a classic 1920s cinema in Thorne, South Yorkshire. With little knowledge of restoration, Gwyn and Kate boldly set about turning the dilapidated building into a family home using masses of concrete after taking advice from an architect friend. The couple are hoping to create a hydraulic glass wall that opens up one side of the house to form a UV-filtered canopy, and there are also plans for a white roof extension that resembles a diving board

programme.title: Our Welsh Chapel Dream
programme.desc: Keith and Marj focus on the last thing they need to do to finally call Capel Salem home: bringing the bedroom inside the building! Marj gilds a vintage French mirror, while Keith takes on storage solutions and they both reflect on their journey so far by visiting a Welsh love spoon workshop

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Consultant Emer Sutherland helps treat an eight-year-old who has fallen 8ft onto concrete while riding his BMX, losing his front teeth and possibly injuring his head and spine. A 19-year-old motorcyclist who hit a bollard requires urgent treatment on his leg, which may otherwise need to be amputated, and X-rays of a stabbing victim yield startling results

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: A woman with a weak immune system owing to the radiotherapy she underwent for breast cancer is bitten by her cat, a minor injury that could cause her serious problems. A 71-year-old with terminal cancer is brought in with breathing difficulties and a decision must be made about whether to resuscitate her if her condition worsens. Meanwhile, a 12-year-old translates for his Brazilian grandmother and a five-year-old has her head wound stitched

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: One-off special in which paramedics respond to reports of a patient in cardiac arrest. When they arrive, theres no answer at the door. Concerned that an elderly relative is attempting CPR inside, they break down two sets of doors to gain entry. Inside they discover an exhausted wife who, despite her own physical problems, has been trying to save her husbands life. Elsewhere, a PE lesson at school ends abruptly when a young boy has an epileptic seizure

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Consultant Emer Sutherland helps treat an eight-year-old who has fallen 8ft onto concrete while riding his BMX, losing his front teeth and possibly injuring his head and spine. A 19-year-old motorcyclist who hit a bollard requires urgent treatment on his leg, which may otherwise need to be amputated, and X-rays of a stabbing victim yield startling results

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: A woman with a weak immune system owing to the radiotherapy she underwent for breast cancer is bitten by her cat, a minor injury that could cause her serious problems. A 71-year-old with terminal cancer is brought in with breathing difficulties and a decision must be made about whether to resuscitate her if her condition worsens. Meanwhile, a 12-year-old translates for his Brazilian grandmother and a five-year-old has her head wound stitched

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: In search of the secret to the bubbles in bubble tea, Kate Quilton visits a cassava farm in Kenya to get to the root of it. Jimmy Doherty is in Somerset exploring why sour milk is sneered at, though soured cream is revered. Plus, Helen Lawal reports from Portugal on canned fish

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: As the season draws to a close for the Brits abroad, the owners of a glampsite in Portugal get hands-on at a goat farm. In France, two Brits attempt to host a wine-tasting night. Meanwhile, at a riding centre, a mother and daughter have cause to celebrate

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: In Murcia, a microbrewery aims to crack the Spanish lager market. Meanwhile, in the south west of France, a couple start an unusual business involving snails

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: In the Dordogne, heavily pregnant Nicole and her husband Nick struggle to install a kitchen before the imminent arrival of their first baby. At the fairy-tale Château de Bourneau, Erin and JB have to transform a neglected three-storey turret into a spectacular entrance stairway. Over in central France, Belinda and Lee have to deliver a three-course charity dinner to keep them firmly on the events map

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: At Chateau du Puits Es Pratx, Tim converts a 180-year-old wine barrel into a quirky dining space, while Sasha creates a Mediterranean garden as a backdrop for weddings

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off at the Five Bells near Dover, where manager Shelley Parnell and her competitive mum Linda Yates hope their bargain-priced BandB will win the day

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The hosts check in to the Thomas Paine Hotel in Thetford, where an inappropriate book is found in a bedside drawer and competition turns fierce at a Home Guard training exercise

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Chris and Sarah Whitehead invite their fellow hoteliers to Tenbury Wells in Worcestershire, where they open the doors of their historic pub The Rose and Crown

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Lesley and Steve Hawker welcome the contestants to the Woodlands Guest House in Exmoor, but after the bad feedback of previous rounds, it seems their rivals are out for revenge

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The BandB owners meet up to find out what they have been paid. Shelley and Linda from The Five Bells want to know why their feedback for breakfast doesnt add up, while Gez from the Thomas Paine Hotel wants to find out why Shelley and Linda scored him so low. Chris and Sarah from The Rose and Crown want to question Gez, and Steve and Lesley from Woodlands Guest House try to get to the naked truth

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend head off to Loughborough, Leicestershire, to take on a 1992 Saab 900 Turbo thats in desperate need of repair. The car belongs to Saab enthusiast and former electrical engineer Pravesh. Sadly, due to ill health, Pravesh has been left with little strength to work on the car, so its been left to rot. His family believe getting his Saab back on the road would give him the boost he needs

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend head to Fife in Scotland to fix up a 1993 Toyota Supra MK4, owned by former competitive motorcycle racer Lisa, who, after a road accident, is no longer able to ride her beloved bikes. Her ongoing mobility problems have meant that the car has ended up in need of TLC. Lisas friends and family hope a fully restored car will lift her spirits

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: This time, Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer are house-hunting in and around Bristol. First, Kirsties with Craig and Rich, who have been looking for a home to start a family in for over a year. Meanwhile, Phil helps mother and daughter Laura and Linda search for a sound investment for the whole family

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer scour the Sussex coast for two sets of house-hunters at opposite ends of their property journey. Kirsties with retired painters and decorators Amanda and Annette, who want a spacious bungalow in a serene setting to suit their futureproofing needs. Eighteen months ago, Amanda was diagnosed with rheumatoid arthritis, making both of them realise that they wanted to seize life and move to their dream forever home. Kirstie shows them different options but by the end theres a clear winner. But can Kirstie secure it for them when its offers over their maximum budget... Meanwhile, Phil helps first-time buyers Danit and Rafi, who are after a one-bed flat close to the buzz of Brighton and Hove. Although they both agree that being close to the areas vibrant queer and Jewish communities is a top priority, Rafi wants Brighton and Danit prefers Hove. All the flats Phil offers up are in contention and it soon becomes clear that their biggest challenge is agreeing on their preferred property

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud visits a house belonging to an engineer that resembles a giant coiled snake. The building was inspired by an ammonite shell and has a scaly, curving structure that spirals over two levels and combines natural materials with the latest modern technology. However, completing the project within the 12-month schedule may not be possible for mechanical engineer Stephen Tetlow and wife Elizabeth

programme.title: Perfect Pub Walks
programme.sub-title: Perfect Pub Walks with Alexander Armstrong
programme.desc: Comedian and presenter Alexander Armstrong explores some of Britains best and most spectacular pub walks. In the first episode, he is joined in Yorkshire by James May, who discusses memories from his childhood, getting repeatedly fired from jobs, his eventful Top Gear days and, under a tree in the grounds of Bolton Abbey, opens up about ageing and retirement

programme.title: Grand Designs: Deconstructed
programme.desc: Behind-the-scenes look at the iconic home-building series. Grand Designs presenter of 26 years Kevin McCloud and Radio 1 Breakfast Show broadcaster and self-confessed superfan Greg James discuss the latest brand-new episode of Grand Designs and the themes from the episode, and answer viewers questions. This episodes build is in the Durham Dales, with artist Sarah and her bright-red triple-roofed hemp house, where the pitfalls of project managing yourself and the joys of building a house from hempcrete are on the menu

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud joins his Australian counterpart Anthony Burke on an architectural road trip, as they go in search of award-winning contemporary Australian design. On the Mornington Peninsula, Anthony and Kevin visit an astonishing modern take on the traditional farmhouse

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: New staff nurse Sophie attends to 22-year-old chef James, who accidentally stabbed himself in the leg while chopping tomatoes. During an eventful shift, she also uses chest compressions to keep alive another patient and helps 54-year-old Bernard, who was out cold for 10 minutes after falling and banging his head against a car. However, when his family arrives, it turns out he had been drinking

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Consultant Jacqui must act fast when severely underweight baby Jaziah is rushed into resus with breathing difficulties. programme.title: Lucan
programme.desc: The body of Sandra Rivett was discovered on November 7, 1974, and the chief suspect was Richard John Bingham, seventh earl of Lucan, the father of the children that Rivett was employed to care for as nanny. However, the earl disappeared and was never brought to justice. Thirty years after the event, Hampshire builder Neil Berriman discovered he was Sandra Rivetts biological son and began a search for the truth about the murder of his birth mother
