programme.title: How to Cook Well in Morocco
programme.desc: Rory OConnell visits the Moroccan city of Fez, where he learns how to make Warka and watches an expert chef make lamb tagine at Cafe Clock. On the rooftop of the Palais Faraj Hotel, he discusses the importance of salads in Moroccan cuisine with chef Mohamed Achoual, before heading back into the medina to the famous Chouara Tanneries, where animal hides are prepared in the traditional way

programme.title: Nevens Ulster Food Tour
programme.desc: Neven Maguire visits Baronscourt Estate in Omagh, County Tyrone, a leading supplier of high-quality venison, and explores the estates approach to deer management and sustainable game meat production. In Derry, he checks into the Bishops Gate Hotel, learning about its history, and some of the notable people who have stayed there. Back home, Neven cooks crusted venison with creamed Cabbage, blackberry jus, and baby carrots

programme.title: RTÉ News: Nine OClock and Weather
programme.desc: The latest national and international news

programme.title: Build Your Own Home
programme.desc: Master builder Harrison Gardner helps newly married couple Aoife NicChraith and Louis Brennan, who have plans for an ambitious modern extension onto their one-bed cottage in Tuam, County Galway. They are essentially attaching a new three bedroom house to a 200 hundred year old house to cater for their growing family

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Retired heptathlon star Jessica Ennis-Hill sets out to discover the truth behind a family mystery concerning her great-great-grandmother. When his father, Jesss great-grandfather was a child his mother Emily Maud, known as Maud, walked out. The family never talked about Maud, and Jesss grandfather has no idea what became of her. Jess wants to investigate what could have happened to make her two-time great-grandmother abandon her children and effectively be written out of the familys history. She also examines her Jamaican four-time great-grandfathers journey from enslavement to land ownership

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: A clairvoyant predicts unusual events that begin occurring in the life of a recently bereaved woman. The team starts to suspect that the psychics powers might be too good to be true, as the woman starts ending up in more and more dangerous situations. When the officers discover a connection to her deceased grandfather, everything begins to fall into place. On the home front, its a big day for Humphrey and Martha as they attend their fostering interviews. The pair are intent on demonstrating how earnest they are to proceed. Detective drama, starring Kris Marshall, Sally Bretton, Zahra Ahmadi and Peter Davison

programme.title: The Phone Box Babies
programme.desc: Revealing insight into the lives and identities of three newborn babies abandoned in the 1960s in different parts of Ireland. This documentary uncovers details about the babies parents, where they come from, and why they were given up. As adults, they discover their connection to each other and embark on a journey to uncover their identities

programme.title: Dolphins: Wonders of the Ocean
programme.desc: Part one of two. Underwater cameraman Ken OSullivan brings viewers on his 20-year journey with dolphins, beginning with an encounter with a lone, lost dolphin in his home place in Clare. Footage captures these underwater mammals hunting and their everyday behaviours. There is also a look at how human activity is threatening these animals in Irish Atlantic waters

programme.title: From that Small Island
programme.desc: Documentary piecing together the jigsaw of Irelands earliest inhabitants, with contributions drawing from genetics and archaeology

programme.title: An Ghig Mhor
programme.desc: Donegal singer-songwriter Eve Belle helps fellow Donegal musician Hannah B from Gaoth Dobhair to organise their first big gig. In Irish

programme.title: Irelands Wild Islands
programme.desc: Eoin Warner explores the wildlife of the countrys Atlantic islands in a 140-year-old Galway hooker fishing boat. He starts his voyage at Rathlin, where he witnesses flightless chicks jumping 300ft from cliff ledges down to the ocean, then heads west for Malin Head and Inishtrahull, encountering basking sharks and dolphins en route

programme.title: Aistear an Amhráin
programme.desc: Garry Mac Donncha explores the history and cultural legacy of one of Irelands best-loved Irish language songs, An Poc ar Buile. Written in the 1940s by Donal Ó Mulláin, a native of Cúil Aodha, An Poc ar Buile is rooted in a 17th-century satirical poem that originally parodied a local landlord. Now, over five decades later, An Poc ar Buile continues to resonate with a new generation and can still be heard in Gaelscoileanna and Coláistí Samhraidh all over the country. In Irish

programme.title: Kayak o Thuaidh
programme.desc: Tessa Fleming and Irial Ó Ceallaigh set off from the historic Fort Dunree for the third leg of their journey. The physical and mental strain of this immense challenge is beginning to show, and a brief respite is needed before they make their way to the remote, abandoned island of Inishtrahull. After this experience of a lifetime, its back to the water and a paddle to the stunning Kinnegoe Bay and the cliffs of Inishowen Head, before crossing Lough Foyle into Co Derry, where they visit the ruins of Saint Aidans church at Magilligan. In Irish

programme.desc: Comedy, co-written by and co-starring Daisy May Cooper. programme.desc: At Castle Black, Jon Snow struggles to mediate between wildling leader Mance Rayder and Stannis Baratheon, while a mournful Cersei continues to worry about the future of her son Tommen in Kings Landing. Tyrion arrives in a new location and is presented with a fresh opportunity and Daenerys grapples with the politics of power in Meereen, as well as her tempestuous dragons. Starring Kit Harington, Lena Headey, Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Sophies therapy session takes an interesting direction when her mother decides to join her. Drama, starring Gabriel Byrne

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Brixham residents raise money for a statue to commemorate fishermen lost at sea, but Pat Seddons plan to support the cause by participating in a fundraising skydive worries her friends and relatives. Jan Hart goes trawling for scallops, and shares some ancient superstitions

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Documentary following stately home owners who hire out their estates to earn extra income, and the clients who pay to use their properties for functions including stag parties, weddings and hunting trips. The programme explores how the reality of life in Britains grand houses is often less glamorous than it appears, as proprietors struggle to maintain crumbling buildings and pay utility bills, and examines the modern-day divide between domestic staff and their employers. Featuring life at Chillingham Castle, Maunsel House, Carlton Towers and Muncaster Castle

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming examines the hidden histories of cities, revealing the sights and sounds rarely witnessed by the public. He begins in London at St Pauls Cathedral, where he visits a place tourists never go, before exploring a hidden park and a little-known church. He also gets a guided tour of Soho from broadcaster Danny Baker

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Margaret travels to Brooklyn for a difficult reunion with the family she left behind in Ireland, while Jimmy faces a decision that could shape the future of Atlantic City. The arrival of Daughertys new federal prosecutor leaves Van Alden weighing his options, a despairing Lucy turns to an old friend for support, and Nucky sets about promoting heavyweight boxing champion Jack Dempseys next fight

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky struggles to deal with a personal loss and seeks advice from Rothstein about his precarious political situation. Jimmy demonstrates his growing authority at Mickeys expense, while Van Alden tries to remedy his fractious relationship with Lucy by hiring a nanny. Prohibition-era drama, starring Steve Buscemi

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Della keeps the firm afloat as Perry grapples with a new career, while Paul accepts a questionable job and Holcomb teams up with a powerful ally. Return of the period crime drama, starring Matthew Rhys

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: After a manhunt leads to the arrests of brothers Rafael and Mateo Gallardo for the McCutcheon murder, Perry initially resists taking the case, until a hunch reels him in. Della goes on a date, while Paul wrestles with a shocking truth

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Ser Dontos spirits Sansa out of Kings Landing and rows her out to a waiting ship, and Pod gives Tyrion news of his forthcoming trial. Tywin counsels Tommen on what makes a good king and also has an offer for Oberyn Martell. Sam decides Castle Black is not a safe places for Gilly, while Jon proposes a bold plan after the wildlings send a chilling message. Across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys picks a champion to take on the best that Meereen has to offer and Davos has an idea about raising funds for Stanniss cause

programme.title: My Brilliant Friend
programme.desc: Elena and Lila fight with their families for the chance to continue their education. Later, a trip out of town becomes a day Elena will never forget. In Italian

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky and Owen travel to Belfast for a meeting with the leaders of the IRA. Back in Atlantic City, Margaret grows concerned about her daughter Emilys health, anticipation builds for Jack Dempseys heavyweight title fight, and Chalkys former cellmate Dunn Purnsley organises a workers strike at the Ritz. Meanwhile, Waxey Gordon tries to bring Manny Horvitz back under control

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Jimmy is undercut by Nucky, forcing him to seek alternative sources of revenue. Margaret hopes to repent her sins by visiting a priest, Lucy deepens Van Aldens misery and the Commodores men look to end a labour dispute before the tourist season hits its peak. Prohibition-era drama, starring Steve Buscemi

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Egans wife is killed and his son is taken into protective custody, while Bayliss and Pembleton continue their investigation in New York. Police drama, starring Kyle Secor

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Part one of two. Russert and Munch investigate the murder of a man found at the grave of his dead wife. Starring Daniel Baldwin, Ned Beatty and Richard Belzer

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon Snow heads into the wildling camp to try to negotiate a peace with Mance Rayder, but an unexpected arrival changes the situation at the Wall, while Daenerys is forced to make a decision about the dragons in Meereen. Cersei demands that Tywin call off her engagement to Loras Tyrell, Bran learns more about his destiny, and Tyrion receives a visit from Jaime as he awaits his fate. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire series of novels, starring Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: At Castle Black, Jon Snow struggles to mediate between wildling leader Mance Rayder and Stannis Baratheon, while a mournful Cersei continues to worry about the future of her son Tommen in Kings Landing. Tyrion arrives in a new location and is presented with a fresh opportunity and Daenerys grapples with the politics of power in Meereen, as well as her tempestuous dragons. Starring Kit Harington, Lena Headey, Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.desc: As a yacht party extends into the night and friends explore Bangkoks clubs, parallel stories unfold with family disagreements over future plans and mysterious happenings at a nearby hotel

programme.title: True Detective
programme.desc: West and Hays think they may have found a connection between the local church and the Purcell crimes, and Woodard finds himself targeted by a vigilante group

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.sub-title: For All Debts Public and Private
programme.desc: Tony invests in a potentially lucrative land deal, but Carmela has doubts about the familys long-term financial security. Meanwhile, Adriana confides in her new friend Danielle, unaware she is an undercover FBI agent, and Christopher resolves to avenge an old murder. James Gandolfini and Michael Imperioli star

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Carrie holds Mr Rabbit at gunpoint after sneaking into his New York City apartment and reveals hell get the diamonds she stole if he leaves her and her family alone. He makes a counter-offer that if she delivers Lucas to him shell be free. Back in Banshee, Proctor celebrates the reopening of a local casino by organising a mixed martial arts bout and securing the services of leading exponent Sanchez - who Hood has to deal with after the fighter rapes and beats a waitress

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The House of Black and White
programme.desc: Arya arrives in Braavos, while Brienne and Pod run into trouble on the road, and Cersei fears for her daughters safety in Dorne as Ellaria Sand seeks revenge for her lover Oberyns death. Stannis has a proposal for Jon and an advisor tempts Daenerys. Fantasy drama, starring Maisie Williams, Lena Headey and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Queen Margaery spends time with her new husband King Tommen. Elsewhere, fugitive Tyrion and Varys walk the Long Bridge of Volantis, and in Braavos, Arya sees the Many-Faced God. Fantasy drama, starring Natalie Dormer and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Pat Seddon considers selling up and visits a clairvoyant, while celebrity chef Mitch Tonks makes an appearance at Brixhams Crab Festival

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Jake becomes emotional during his session, and Amy makes a decision that will change the direction of her life

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Maritime Inn landlady Pat gets her first full house of the season as Brixhams tourist trade picks up for the summer - but refuses to hire anyone to help her with the extra work. Powerboat instructor Mike Weatherbee tries to enforce the laws of the sea, carpet-cleaner Dave Satchwill prepares to lead the towns popular ghost tour, and lone fisherman Dave Brown reveals his unusual methods

programme.title: The Cinema List: Jurassic (2025)
programme.desc: Welcome to a Cinema List 65 million years in the making, going through the best moments from the Jurassic franchise - from the 1993 original to Jurassic World: Dominion

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: A thwarted Nazi experiment lands the Allies with an unexpected visitor from another dimension in the form of a bright-red demon. A secretive US government agency fosters the little devil and he grows up to be its crucial weapon against the forces of darkness - but the re-emergence of the sinister wizard Rasputin proves a challenge even for him. Action fantasy based on the comic-book series, with Ron Perlman, John Hurt, Selma Blair and Karel Roden.

programme.title: Seeking Justice
programme.desc: A man whose wife has been attacked is approached by a member of a vigilante group who offers to deal with the perpetrator. He accepts the offer and is told he will have to return the favour - but when the time comes to pay up, he discovers he is required to kill someone. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, January Jones and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: A storm-chaser and her estranged husband are brought together in a joint project to monitor the path of an oncoming tornado - but the pair face a race against the clock as a rival government-backed group with hi-tech resources tries to beat them to it. Action thriller, starring Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton, Cary Elwes, Jami Gertz and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: An evil queen learns that her reign will last for ever if she kills a princess, so sends a renowned warrior to find and murder her. However, he comes to realise his mistresss evil ways, and instead trains his intended victim to fight so they can bring the tyrants rule to an end. Fantasy adventure, with Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth and Charlize Theron

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Ancient titans Godzilla and Kong clash in an epic battle against an undiscovered threat hidden within the Earth. Director Adam Wingards blockbusting fantasy adventure, starring Rebecca Hall, Dan Stevens and Brian Tyree Henry

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Ruler of the Persian empire and self-proclaimed god Xerxes continues his campaign to crush the emerging Greek nation, forcing a general from the democratic city state of Athens to lead his navy into battle against Xerxes vast armada. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Sullivan Stapleton, Eva Green and Lena Headey

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: A gifted teenager investigates the secrets hidden in his dead parents past, leading him to a mysterious corporation and an incident that imbues him with superhuman powers. A personal tragedy drives him to use his new-found abilities to fight crime, and he is soon drawn into a deadly battle against a former colleague of his father, who has undergone a devastating transformation of his own. Superhero adventure reboot, starring Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone and Rhys Ifans

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The webslinging hero battles a powerful new enemy when a downtrodden engineer develops lethal electrical powers, which he unleashes on those he believes have betrayed him. As if that wasnt enough to keep him busy, he faces an even greater threat when he is reunited with an unstable old friend who has been charged with a sinister mission by his dying father, leading to a series of tense confrontations that threaten to change his life for ever. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Jamie Foxx and Dane DeHaan

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: A thwarted Nazi experiment lands the Allies with an unexpected visitor from another dimension in the form of a bright-red demon. A secretive US government agency fosters the little devil and he grows up to be its crucial weapon against the forces of darkness - but the re-emergence of the sinister wizard Rasputin proves a challenge even for him. Action fantasy based on the comic-book series, with Ron Perlman, John Hurt, Selma Blair and Karel Roden.

programme.title: Seeking Justice
programme.desc: A man whose wife has been attacked is approached by a member of a vigilante group who offers to deal with the perpetrator. He accepts the offer and is told he will have to return the favour - but when the time comes to pay up, he discovers he is required to kill someone. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, January Jones and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: A gladiator in the ancient Roman city falls in love with the daughter of a wealthy merchant, who is being forced into marriage with a corrupt senator. When the nearby volcano Vesuvius erupts, he fights to save her and escape the destruction of the city. Disaster movie, starring Kit Harington, Emily Browning, Carrie-Anne Moss and Kiefer Sutherland

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Ancient titans Godzilla and Kong clash in an epic battle against an undiscovered threat hidden within the Earth. Director Adam Wingards blockbusting fantasy adventure, starring Rebecca Hall, Dan Stevens and Brian Tyree Henry

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: A former Marine sniper is coaxed back into action when government officials need his help to prevent an assassination attempt on the US president. However, the intended target is in fact an African archbishop, and the marksman is set up by double-crossing agents to take the fall, forcing him to go on the run as he fights to clear his name. Action thriller, with Mark Wahlberg, Michael Pena and Danny Glover

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Ruler of the Persian empire and self-proclaimed god Xerxes continues his campaign to crush the emerging Greek nation, forcing a general from the democratic city state of Athens to lead his navy into battle against Xerxes vast armada. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Sullivan Stapleton, Eva Green and Lena Headey

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic world, a kidnapped girl grows into a warrior who seeks vengeance against a great biker horde led by the crazed Dementus. Director George Millers Mad Max: Fury Road prequel, starring Anya Taylor-Joy, Chris Hemsworth and Tom Burke

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: After losing his home, Lucius, the son of a slain Roman General, is forced to enter the Colosseum in an attempt to bring glory back to Rome. Ridley Scotts historical drama sequel, starring Paul Mescal, Pedro Pascal and Denzel Washington, with Connie Nielsen and Derek Jacobi reprising their roles from the first film

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a world dominated by deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator, and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The bandana-wearing one-man army has turned his back on violence to live a quiet life in Thailand. But before long he takes up arms once again to rescue a party of missionaries who have been taken captive en route to Burma by a sadistic military officer. Action sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Julie Benz and Graham McTavish

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic world, a kidnapped girl grows into a warrior who seeks vengeance against a great biker horde led by the crazed Dementus. Director George Millers Mad Max: Fury Road prequel, starring Anya Taylor-Joy, Chris Hemsworth and Tom Burke

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: A gladiator in the ancient Roman city falls in love with the daughter of a wealthy merchant, who is being forced into marriage with a corrupt senator. When the nearby volcano Vesuvius erupts, he fights to save her and escape the destruction of the city. Disaster movie, starring Kit Harington, Emily Browning, Carrie-Anne Moss and Kiefer Sutherland

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A powerful crime kingpin hosts a martial arts tournament on his island lair. A former Shaolin monk is recruited by an intelligence agency to enter the tournament and expose the crime lords opium and slavery rings. He finds himself fighting for his life alongside two Vietnam veterans who are both fleeing their own enemies. Thriller, starring Bruce Lee, John Saxon, Jim Kelly and Kien Shih

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Young Angelo dreams of becoming an explorer and a zoologist. When he goes to visit his granny, his parents leave him behind at a rest stop, and he decides to cut through the forest in search of them. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Kristen McGuire

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: A fox and a hare embark on a journey to find their missing owl friend. Animated adventure, with the voices of Teresa Gallagher, Dan Skinner and Sarah Madigan

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: The grumpy ogre longs for his simple life as a feared monster, so strikes a deal with magical trickster Rumpelstiltskin to get back to the way things were. However, he soon finds there is a catch - he ends up stuck in an alternate world where none of his friends know who he is and where Rumpelstiltskin has become the kingdoms tyrannical ruler. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy and Cameron Diaz

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: A boy becomes obsessed with a sinister elderly neighbour living in a creepy old house. On Halloween night, he and two friends discover the chilling truth - the house is alive and eats anything that comes too close, including children. Animated comedy horror, with the voices of Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Steve Buscemi, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Jason Lee

programme.title: The Inventor
programme.desc: Leonardo Da Vinci explores the meaning of life with the help of a French princess. Stop-motion animated adventure, with the voices of Daisy Ridley, Marion Cotillard, Matt Berry and Stephen Fry

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: In a world of living ideograms, multi-expressional emoji Gene embarks on a daring mission to find notorious hacker Jailbreak. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of TJ Miller, James Corden and Patrick Stewart

programme.title: The Rugrats Movie
programme.desc: Tommy tries to return his new brother to the baby shop, helped by Angelica, Chuckie, Phil and Lil - but the friends become lost in dense woodlands en route, turning their expedition into a scary and exciting journey of discovery. Animated comedy based on the TV series, with the voices of Elizabeth Daily, Christine Cavanaugh, Kath Soucie, Whoopi Goldberg and Busta Rhymes

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure with Scientists!
programme.desc: The bungling leader of a band of inept buccaneers is determined to prove his worth to his rivals and win the coveted Pirate of the Year award. An encounter with the naturalist Charles Darwin gives him the chance to pull off a daring crime - if he can survive coming face to face with the pirate-hating Queen Victoria. Animated comedy, with the voices of Hugh Grant, Martin Freeman, Imelda Staunton and David Tennant

programme.title: The Inventor
programme.desc: Leonardo Da Vinci explores the meaning of life with the help of a French princess. Stop-motion animated adventure, with the voices of Daisy Ridley, Marion Cotillard, Matt Berry and Stephen Fry

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: A fox and a hare embark on a journey to find their missing owl friend. Animated adventure, with the voices of Teresa Gallagher, Dan Skinner and Sarah Madigan

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight and his allies pursue four supervillains who have joined forces to cause havoc on Halloween. They discover the gang is working for the Joker, who has a grander scheme in mind - unleashing a computer virus that will make every piece of technology in Gotham City obey his commands. Animated adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Troy Baker

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: The animal-loving family heads for Africa, where Eliza discovers unscrupulous poachers are plotting to kill an entire herd of elephants with the aid of a deadly electric fence, leaving her and ever-present pal Darwin to save the day. Animated adventure, with the voices of Lacey Chabert, Tim Curry, Tom Kane, Cree Summer, Lynn Redgrave and Jodi Carlisle

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
programme.desc: Siren steals the Book of Legends to locate the Trident of Atlantis so she can reign supreme over the ocean. Animation with the voice of Yvette Nicole Brown

programme.title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash traps The Flash in a time loop so he is forced to relive the same day

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette and Prince Dereks anniversary celebrations are thwarted by an evil sorcerer searching for a magical orb hidden deep inside their castle. When Derek is lured out of the palace to rescue his kidnapped mother, Odette calls on her band of animal friends for help. Animated fantasy sequel, with the voices of Michelle Nicastro, Douglas Sills, Jake Williamson and Christy Landers

programme.title: Extinct
programme.desc: Flummels are an extinct species of rabbit-like creatures with holes in their centre. One day two of the fluffy animals find themselves transported from 1835 to modern day Shanghai. Animated adventure from the makers of The Simpsons Movie, featuring the voices of Adam Devine, Rachel Bloom and Ken Jeong

programme.title: Fireheart
programme.desc: In 1930, 16-year-old Georgia Nolan dreams of being the worlds first-ever female firefighter. When a mysterious arsonist starts burning down Broadway, New Yorks firemen begin vanishing. Georgias father is called out of retirement by the Mayor to lead the investigation into the disappearances. Desperate to help her father and save the city, Georgia disguises herself as a young man called Joe and joins a group of misfit firefighters trying to stop the arsonist. Animated adventure, with the voices of Olivia Cooke and Kenneth Branagh

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: Anxiety-crippled mallard Mack spins nightmarish bedtime stories to educate his children, Dax and Gwen, about the perils of straying from the comfort of Moose Head Pond. Eventually Mack organises a spontaneous family migration south from leafy New England to Jamaica, accompanied by curmudgeonly uncle Dan. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Kumail Nanjiani, Elizabeth Banks, Danny DeVito and Carol Kane

programme.title: Dragon Rider
programme.desc: A silver dragon named Firedrake and his friends search for a mythical safe haven hidden in the Himalayas. Animated family adventure based on the novel by Cornelia Funke, featuring the voices of Felicity Jones, Thomas Brodie-Sangster, Patrick Stewart and Freddie Highmore

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: Ambitious fish Oscar dreams of escaping his humdrum undersea life. His wish comes true when a gangster shark keen to escape a world of organised crime seeks his help in faking his own death. But Oscar soon finds himself out of his depth as his fearsome reputation gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Will Smith, Robert De Niro, Martin Scorsese, Renee Zellweger, Angelina Jolie and Jack Black

programme.title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: Five years after events of the first film, teenager Finn has rebuilt Bricksburg into a post-apocalyptic wasteland. When Emmet is plagued by a vision of an impending cataclysm, he and Lucy fight to protect their beloved city from invaders. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Chris Pratt, Elizabeth Banks and Will Arnett

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: Inventor Wallace and his canine sidekick Gromit have set up a pest-control service, and are called in to stop rabbits overrunning a garden show. However, the pair are overwhelmed when a destructive giant bunny arrives on the scene, while an interfering aristocrat contrives to make matters worse. Nick Parks Oscar-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Peter Sallis, Ralph Fiennes and Helena Bonham Carter

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula opens a luxury resort for monsters, to provide a refuge from terrified humans. His cosy sanctuary is disrupted when a normal man unwittingly checks in, and the situation is complicated when the unwanted guest takes a liking to the counts daughter. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his sons tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg and Selena Gomez

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: A free-spirited horse refuses to bend to the will of humans, no matter how badly he is treated by a harsh soldier, whose cruelty only succeeds in driving the stallion to make a daring escape attempt. Animated adventure, with the voices of Matt Damon, James Cromwell, Charles Napier, Daniel Studi and Richard McGonagle

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: A swashbuckling hero has 10 days to recover a priceless book from a deceitful sea goddess or his friend will be executed. As he sets out on his quest, he discovers the condemned mans fiancee has stowed away on board his ship to make sure he goes through with the task. Animated adventure, with the voices of Brad Pitt, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Joseph Fiennes and Michelle Pfeiffer

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A journalist desperate to be posted to a war zone encounters a special forces agent, who claims to have been part of a top-secret project to endow soldiers with superhuman powers. As the reporter joins the supposed psychic on a journey across Iraq, he discovers the bizarre story behind the experiment. Satirical comedy, starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monasterys financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A veteran lifeguard commands a highly trained team that keeps the sun-kissed resort of Emerald Bay safe. As he breaks in some new recruits - including an insubordinate former Olympic swimmer - he has to contend with a dangerous new drug sweeping the beach. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dwayne Johnson, Zac Efron, Alexandra Daddario and Priyanka Chopra

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancees latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: An architect has a fling with a kooky waitress, who takes it upon herself to move into his house and pass herself off as his wife. When the woman he is actually in love with says she thinks the sham marriage is good for him, he decides to play along with the deception. Romantic comedy, starring Steve Martin, Goldie Hawn, Dana Delany, Donald Moffat and Julie Harris

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A journalist desperate to be posted to a war zone encounters a special forces agent, who claims to have been part of a top-secret project to endow soldiers with superhuman powers. As the reporter joins the supposed psychic on a journey across Iraq, he discovers the bizarre story behind the experiment. Satirical comedy, starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: More than a decade on from his appearance in documentary series The Office, a film crew is once again following the life of David Brent. He is now working as a rep for a cleaning-goods distributor, but harbours dreams of making it big in the music business. Acting on this, he takes three weeks off work and tours with a new-look version of Foregone Conclusion, the band he fronted in the 1990s. Mockumentary comedy, starring Ricky Gervais, Ben Bailey Smith and Tom Basden.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, shes surprised to learn hes from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they arent so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwans novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: Cynical, hard-drinking teacher Elizabeth Halsey hates her job and the kids in her class, and hopes to escape her daily grind by landing a rich husband. A wealthy substitute seems like a suitable candidate, but she has a rival for his attention in a squeaky-clean colleague. Comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake, Jason Segel and Lucy Punch

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Dim-witted friends Harry and Lloyd are reunited after 20 years. When Harry discovers he has a daughter he never knew about, he breaks his friend out of a psychiatric hospital and they go on a road trip with the intention of fulfilling parental responsibilities neither of them is capable of. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: A second-rate ice-hockey player with a thuggish temperament discovers he has a powerful golf swing. He decides to enter a prestigious tournament to raise enough money to save his debt-ridden grandmothers house from falling into the hands of tax inspectors. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Christopher McDonald, Carl Weathers, Julie Bowen and Frances Bay

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monasterys financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Thirtysomething slacker Dupree finds himself out of a job with nowhere to live, and turns to his newly married best friend Carl for a place to stay. But Carl comes to regret his act of hospitality as the layabout shows no sign of ever moving out - not to mention his annoyance when his new wife takes a liking to their laid-back guest. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Matt Dillon, Kate Hudson and Michael Douglas.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: An architect has a fling with a kooky waitress, who takes it upon herself to move into his house and pass herself off as his wife. When the woman he is actually in love with says she thinks the sham marriage is good for him, he decides to play along with the deception. Romantic comedy, starring Steve Martin, Goldie Hawn, Dana Delany, Donald Moffat and Julie Harris

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who wont be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Paynes comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, DaVine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: Fast-talking Detroit cop Axel Foley heads for Los Angeles after an old friend is murdered before his eyes. His search for the killers leads him into conflict with a seemingly untouchable drug kingpin, but he also has to contend with the local force, who do not want him taking matters into his own hands. Comedy thriller, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Ronny Cox, John Ashton and Steven Berkoff

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: The eccentric pet detective is coaxed out of self-imposed exile in a Buddhist monastery to visit Africa and help search for a sacred white bat. However, his unique investigative talents are tested to the limits as he faces a race against time to find the missing creature and prevent a tribal war. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey, Simon Callow and Bob Gunton

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: A former member of a singing trio, now running a hotel on a Greek island, is reunited with her old bandmates for her daughters wedding - but is surprised when three of her old flames also show up unexpectedly. The three men have been invited by the bride, who wants to find out which one of them is her father. Musical comedy, with a soundtrack of Abba songs, starring Meryl Streep, Pierce Brosnan, Julie Walters, Colin Firth, Stellan Skarsgard and Amanda Seyfried

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: Its five years since Sophie invited her three possible dads to her wedding, and now most of her family are reunited as she prepares for the grand reopening of the Hotel Bella Donna. Along the way, she learns more about her mothers past. Abba-themed musical sequel, starring Amanda Seyfried, Lily James, Pierce Brosnan, Cher and Andy Garcia

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, shes surprised to learn hes from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they arent so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwans novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: The ragtag soldiers of the Walmington-on-Sea Home Guard are given the chance to prove their mettle by apprehending three German aviators who have parachuted into the country in the vanguard of a suspected Nazi invasion. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Arthur Lowe, John Le Mesurier, Clive Dunn, Bill Pertwee, Ian Lavender and Arnold Ridley

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Favourites
programme.desc: Discover some of the very best Sky Originals to watch with the whole family, from Monster Family to The Amazing Maurice

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A childrens football team competes in a world championship, but one member is left off the field to look after the canine mascot. When an evil plot emerges to sabotage the tournament, the quick-witted dog assembles the other mascots into a team to foil the villains responsible. Family adventure, starring Matthew James Roberts and Kristin Carey, with the voice of Rob Schneider

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: DArtagnan faces a race against time to rescue his kidnapped sweetheart, the queens seamstress and confidante Constance. The young womans survival may rest with Milady, compelling DArtagnan to forge an uneasy alliance with his former enemy. Meanwhile, King Louis XIII faces the prospect of civil war, fuelled by conspirators within his royal court. Swashbuckling sequel, starring François Civil, Eva Green and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Jackie Chans The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A bumbling chauffeur steps in to take the place of a secret agent injured in an explosion. Wearing the agents hi-tech suit, and with the help of a rookie spy, the humble driver now has all the power he needs to stop a villain from gaining global domination by polluting the worlds water supply. Comedy adventure, starring Jackie Chan, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Isaacs and Richie Coster

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Scientist Trevor Anderson sets out to locate his missing explorer brother after receiving a book charting his last journey. Accompanied by his nephew and an Icelandic guide, he is led to a mountain peak, where he stumbles across a system of caves leading to a lost underground world. Fantasy adventure, starring Brendan Fraser, Josh Hutcherson and Anita Briem

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: A teenager picks up a distress signal originating from the middle of the ocean. Joining an expedition to track the signal to its source, he discovers an unexplored island inhabited by strange creatures, and searches for a way to rescue its sole human inhabitant. Fantasy adventure sequel to Journey to the Centre of the Earth, starring Dwayne Johnson, Michael Caine and Josh Hutcherson

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures flee from an evil wizard, only to end up magically transported to modern-day New York. They search for a way to get back to their own village while evading their enemy, who has followed them to the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, with Neil Patrick Harris, Hank Azaria and Jayma Mays, plus voices of Jonathan Winters and Katy Perry

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures and their human friends go on a rescue mission to Paris. Their old foe Gargamel the evil wizard has created mischievous smurfs of his own and kidnapped Smurfette to learn the secret of her magic. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Hank Azaria and Neil Patrick Harris, with the voices of Katy Perry and Christina Ricci

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: When a young girl is sent to live with her uncle on his remote country estate after her parents die, she discovers a magical garden. Director Marc Mundens adaptation of the classic Frances Hodgson Burnett tale, starring Colin Firth, Julie Walters and Dixie Egerickx

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A childrens football team competes in a world championship, but one member is left off the field to look after the canine mascot. When an evil plot emerges to sabotage the tournament, the quick-witted dog assembles the other mascots into a team to foil the villains responsible. Family adventure, starring Matthew James Roberts and Kristin Carey, with the voice of Rob Schneider

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Lao Luo is a washed-up stuntman with a deformed horse called Red Hare, who he saved from euthanasia. The duo become overnight sensations when a fight with debt collectors goes viral. Writer/director Larry Yangs action drama, starring Jackie Chan, Liu Haocun and Kevin Guo. In Mandarin, with subtitles

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: A teenager picks up a distress signal originating from the middle of the ocean. Joining an expedition to track the signal to its source, he discovers an unexplored island inhabited by strange creatures, and searches for a way to rescue its sole human inhabitant. Fantasy adventure sequel to Journey to the Centre of the Earth, starring Dwayne Johnson, Michael Caine and Josh Hutcherson

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures flee from an evil wizard, only to end up magically transported to modern-day New York. They search for a way to get back to their own village while evading their enemy, who has followed them to the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, with Neil Patrick Harris, Hank Azaria and Jayma Mays, plus voices of Jonathan Winters and Katy Perry

programme.title: Save the Cinema
programme.desc: Drama telling the true story of Liz Evans from Carmarthen, south-west Wales, who started a campaign in the 1990s to save the towns Lyric Cinema. With the help of local politician Richard Goodridge, Liz manages to persuade Steven Spielberg to show a premiere of Jurassic Park at the Lyric. Starring Samantha Morton, Tom Felton and Jonathan Pryce

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Lao Luo is a washed-up stuntman with a deformed horse called Red Hare, who he saved from euthanasia. The duo become overnight sensations when a fight with debt collectors goes viral. Writer/director Larry Yangs action drama, starring Jackie Chan, Liu Haocun and Kevin Guo. In Mandarin, with subtitles

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: In modern-day London, Oliver Twist is a talented graffiti artist who is lured into a street gang headed by Fagin. Before long, he and his hustlers plan the heist of the century. Director Martin Owens update to Charles Dickens Oliver Twist, starring Michael Caine, Lena Headey, Noel Clarke, and Sally Collett, who also wrote the screenplay

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures and their human friends go on a rescue mission to Paris. Their old foe Gargamel the evil wizard has created mischievous smurfs of his own and kidnapped Smurfette to learn the secret of her magic. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Hank Azaria and Neil Patrick Harris, with the voices of Katy Perry and Christina Ricci

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: An orphaned girl befriends a benevolent giant, who takes her off to a magical land, where they attempt to stop the man-eating creatures that are invading the human world. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure based on Roald Dahls book, starring Mark Rylance, Ruby Barnhill and Penelope Wilton

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: A ruthless warlord resolves to rid the desert of its few remaining tribes, prompting them to seek the help of a legendary assassin to end the despots reign of terror by destroying his source of power - a beautiful but deadly sorceress. Fantasy action adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, Steven Brand, Kelly Hu and Michael Clarke Duncan

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2: The Runaway
programme.desc: Thomas and Bea are now married and living with Peter and his rabbit family. Bored of life in the garden, Peter goes to the big city, where he meets shady characters and ends up creating chaos for the whole family. Adventure sequel, starring Rose Byrne and Domhnall Gleeson, with the voices of James Corden and Margot Robbie

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Oscar-winning musical version of the stage play based on Charles Dickens classic tale about a lonely workhouse orphan who ends up on the cold streets of London, where he falls under the wing of petty crook Fagin and his gang of young backstreet thieves. Featuring the iconic songs Food, Glorious Food, Consider Yourself, As Long as He Needs Me and Youve Got to Pick a Pocket or Two. Starring Ron Moody, Mark Lester, Oliver Reed, Jack Wild, Harry Secombe, Shani Wallis and Leonard Rossiter

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A teenager discovers his new neighbour is the writer of a popular series of books, who harbours a terrifying secret. The ghosts and monsters the author writes about are real, and his stories keep them contained. The youngster accidentally releases them into the real world, and has to find a way to get them back in the books before they can cause chaos. Fantasy adventure, starring Jack Black and Dylan Minnette

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freyas army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravennas wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations
programme.desc: A New York businessman is thrilled to hear his aunt has left him a considerable inheritance - but to get it, he must ensure the local gospel choir wins a forthcoming competition. Luckily, a few of the residents turn out to have a touch of talent, but he still faces a tough task pulling them into shape. Musical comedy, starring Cuba Gooding Jr, Beyonce Knowles, Melba Moore and Lou Myers

programme.title: The Birds
programme.desc: A San Francisco socialite takes a shine to a man she meets by chance, and follows him home to a Californian coastal community. Her arrival coincides with a series of mysterious attacks on people by birds, which soon escalates as vast flocks go on the warpath. Alfred Hitchcocks thriller, based on a Daphne du Maurier short story, starring Tippi Hedren, Rod Taylor, Suzanne Pleshette, Jessica Tandy and Veronica Cartwright

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death takes over the body of a recently deceased young man, and embarks on a mission to claim the life of a powerful media tycoon, but ends up falling in love with his daughter instead - leaving him on the horns of a dilemma. Remake of 1934 romantic fantasy Death Takes a Holiday, starring Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins and Claire Forlani

programme.title: The Woman in Black: Angel of Death
programme.desc: A group of evacuees and their teachers hope to find peace by escaping the nightly air raids on London at the remote Eel Marsh House. What they do not realise is that its malevolent ghost is still in residence and is out for blood. Horror sequel set during the Second World War, starring Helen McCrory, Jeremy Irvine and Phoebe Fox

programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Meteorologist Kate Cooper crosses paths with social media star Tyler Owens. He recklessly chases storms with his crew and gleefully posts their daredevil exploits, as multiple storm systems converge over central Oklahoma. Standalone disaster sequel, starring Daisy Edgar-Jones and Glen Powell

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowes remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A rebellious, hip-swinging student from the city moves to a small religious community, where he instantly clashes with an old-school fire-and-brimstone preacher - who has banned dancing and rock n roll because he considers them immoral. Drama, starring Kevin Bacon, Lori Singer, John Lithgow, Chris Penn, Dianne Wiest and Sarah Jessica Parker

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Fugitive serial killer Dr Hannibal Lecter has gone into hiding as an academic in Italy, but a disfigured victim is determined to find him and inflict a gruesome revenge. FBI agent Clarice Starling is once again drawn into the doctors deadly orbit as she finds herself being used as bait for the avengers trap. Ridley Scotts thriller sequel, starring Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman and Ray Liotta

programme.title: Manodrome
programme.desc: Concerned about his girlfriends pregnancy, Ralphies life spirals when he meets a mysterious family. Writer/director John Trengoves thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Adrien Brody and Odessa Young

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A man living in a bleak future years after a nuclear war has fake memories of being a secret agent implanted into his brain. However, the procedure uncovers the fact that he really is a spy with his memory erased, and he is forced to become a fugitive from the totalitarian government. Sci-fi thriller remake, with Colin Farrell, Kate Beckinsale and Jessica Biel

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Motorcycle stuntman Johnny Blaze sells his soul to diabolical Mephistopheles to save the life of his father. His bargain dooms him to pass each night as Ghost Rider, a demonic skeletal biker bound to take evil souls to Hell. However, conflict between Mephistopheles and his son offers Johnny the chance to win back his humanity. Fantasy thriller based on the comic-book, starring Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes and Wes Bentley

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A mutated virus sweeps across America, turning most of the population into hideous flesh-eating zombies. A hard-drinking fearless adventurer leads a small band of young survivors on a perilous journey through the wasteland in search of a safe haven. Comedy horror, with Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Emma Stone and Abigail Breslin

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A veteran lifeguard commands a highly trained team that keeps the sun-kissed resort of Emerald Bay safe. As he breaks in some new recruits - including an insubordinate former Olympic swimmer - he has to contend with a dangerous new drug sweeping the beach. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dwayne Johnson, Zac Efron, Alexandra Daddario and Priyanka Chopra

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, shes surprised to learn hes from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they arent so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwans novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: In 1976, Jamaica is dangerously divided across political lines and musician Bob Marley vows to quell the violence by performing at the Smile Jamaica Concert. Two days before the high-profile gig, gunmen break into the singers home, shooting Bob, his wife Rita and manager Don Taylor. Everyone survives and Marley moves to London with his entourage to begin work on the LP Exodus under Island Records supremo Chris Blackwell. Biographical drama, starring Kingsley Ben-Adir, Lashana Lynch and James Norton

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Maverick film-maker Carl Denham and his cast and crew board a ship bound for a mysterious island - but when they arrive, a giant gorilla carries off their leading lady, Ann Darrow. As the crew makes its way through the teeming jungle to find her, the director concocts a dangerous scheme to capture the great ape and take it back to New York. Peter Jacksons remake of the fantasy adventure, starring Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody and Andy Serkis, in a dual role as the ships cook and motion-captured creature

programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: A family experience strange events in their house and become convinced it is haunted. However, after moving on, they find the dark forces have followed them and when their son mysteriously falls into a coma, they must find a way to get rid of the paranormal entities tormenting them. Horror, starring Patrick Wilson and Rose Byrne

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: A couple previously tormented by paranormal activity discover their nightmares are not over. As more strange events occur, they turn to a group of paranormal investigators for help in uncovering the dark secrets that connect them to the spirit world. Horror sequel, starring Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne and Barbara Hershey

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Oct 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Juliet and Romeo
programme.desc: Two lovers find themselves central figures in a journey of battles and betrayal. Musical version of the classic tale, starring Clara Rugaard, Jamie Ward, Rebel Wilson and Jason Isaacs

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: An international action superstar gets involved in a rescue operation of a beloved zoo panda named Hu Hu. Chinese comedy, starring Jackie Chan and Xiang Wei, with subtitles

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When best friends and roommates Dreux and Alyssa discover the latters boyfriend has blown their rent money, the duo faces a race against time to avoid eviction. Comedy, starring Keke Palmer and SZA

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the woman of his dreams is kidnapped, a man turns an inability to feel physical pain into an unexpected advantage in his quest to rescue her. Action comedy, starring Jack Quaid, Ray Nicholson and Amber Midthunder

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: An international action superstar gets involved in a rescue operation of a beloved zoo panda named Hu Hu. Chinese comedy, starring Jackie Chan and Xiang Wei, with subtitles

programme.title: Juliet and Romeo
programme.desc: Two lovers find themselves central figures in a journey of battles and betrayal. Musical version of the classic tale, starring Clara Rugaard, Jamie Ward, Rebel Wilson and Jason Isaacs

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the woman of his dreams is kidnapped, a man turns an inability to feel physical pain into an unexpected advantage in his quest to rescue her. Action comedy, starring Jack Quaid, Ray Nicholson and Amber Midthunder

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: In 1838 Germany, Thomas Hutter is sent to the Carpathian mountains to secure the signature of enigmatic nobleman Count Orlok on a property sale in the German city of Wisborg. Thomas leaves his bride Ellen in the care of friend Friedrich Harding and his wife Anna. The young man barely survives the exhausting trip to Europe and stumbles home to find Ellen driven to delirium by a telepathic bond to the Count. Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbets drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn

programme.title: Juliet and Romeo
programme.desc: Two lovers find themselves central figures in a journey of battles and betrayal. Musical version of the classic tale, starring Clara Rugaard, Jamie Ward, Rebel Wilson and Jason Isaacs

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young couple flee the city during a zombie outbreak, only to be involved in a car crash. When the man awakes, his girlfriend is missing, so he bands together with a rugged survivalist to find his partner - but he only has selected memories of what he has been through. Apocalypse drama, starring Carrie-Anne Moss, Douglas Smith, Frank Grillo and Kimberley-Sue Murray

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: After a family barricade themselves inside their remote farmhouse when a creature attacks, a father slowly transforms into something unrecognisable. Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the woman of his dreams is kidnapped, a man turns an inability to feel physical pain into an unexpected advantage in his quest to rescue her. Action comedy, starring Jack Quaid, Ray Nicholson and Amber Midthunder

Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson
